quote: So many people mistakenly take the Bible as a mere reading book! They read it every now and then! Well, that’s a noble thing to do, but a more solemn way is to see the Bible as not just a reading book, but a true practical book for true worshipers, and live it as such!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-behavior, christian-life, christianity, reading-the-bible

quote: If you really know how great a competition it is to enter into the Kingdom of God is, you would have increased your competitive power greatly in your pursuit for the Kingdom of God
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-life, christianity, heaven, the-kingdom-of-god

quote: How can the creation challenge and control the Creator? Oh mortal man, know that there is an immortal God with an immortal power!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christianity, excessiveness, living-life, philosophy, pride, science, the-power-of-god, thought, wisdom

quote: So many people concentrate on knowing who a good preacher or a bad preacher is and so many people concentrate on knowing what the word of God is! The former is good but the latter is noble. The latter is the best answer to the former. The real duty of man is never to know man but to know God through Christ Jesus! Knowing the word of God is the true way to knowing God!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-noble-christian, accusations, christian-life, christian-living, christian-quotes, christianity, fake-pastors, false-prophets, knowing-christ, knowing-god, the-arduous-errand, the-word-of-god, true-worshippers

quote: Jesus Christ has already come to suffer in the hands of men and He shall least entertain anyone who will disturb Him in eternal eternity in the Kingdom of God! If you want to join Him, ponder!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: awaiting-christ, christian-life, christian-quotes, christianity, good-morning-quotes, heaven, heaven-and-hell, inspirational-quotes, living-well-quotes, motivational-quotes, righteous-living, staying-just, the-coming-of-jesus-christ, the-second-coming-of-christ

quote: If man will understand the real essence of staying in the solitude with his Maker alone, he will never spend all his time with the crowd always
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-dedicated-life, a-different-life, alone-in-his-presence, christianity, life-and-living, real-christianity, solitude, solitude-as-a-choice, solitude-quotes, time-for-god, understanding-worship

quote: if you really want to understand the real fear of God, ponder over Joseph with Potiphar's wife in the secret place; think about Abraham on his arduous errand to sacrifice Isaac without the knowledge of Sarah ; understand the urgency Jesus Christ attached to His work and His eagerness to do His Fathers will; appreciate the courage with which Shadrach Meshach and Abednego stood against all odds and also remember Daniel in the Lions Den.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-life, christian-living, christianity, courage, courage-against-the-storm, life, living-well-quotes, selflessness, shadrak, the-fear-of-god, urgency-to-purpose

quote: In sorrow and in pain, still do remember your Master Jehovah; He can make things that do not matter, matter.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-life, christian-living, christianity, christians-who-suffer, faithful-christians, faithfullness-to-god, pain, suffering-of-humanity, suffering-quote, they-that-know-their-god

quote: Christianity would have lacked a great essence without the Bible. A Christian who seldom devotes a little time to read the Bible is with a great question mark.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bible-study, christian-life, christianity, knowing-the-word, living-for-christ, prayer, prayer-life, prayer-quotes, reading-the-bible

quote: A hero takes steps with the vision of bringing what is beyond the eyes of mere men into reality for them to come to a certain realization. A hero opens doors for the eyes of mere men to see things inside the closed doors and ponder, learn lessons and think of different actions! A hero faces challenges in an overcoming manner with a certain charisma that surpasses the understanding of mere men! To be a hero, one needs a certain gut! It is not as if heroes don’t hit the rock bottom, never! Heroes meet big problems, but big problems and challenges are what defines heroism, and even if heroes are unable to arrest and cripple all the challenges they meet, they must never be discredited for their awesome ingenuity that brought awe, became a yardstick, natured minds, provoked thoughts and caused the envy of mere men to shake, gave people reasons to reason, showed people the essence of life, cleared the path for people to take their journey, and epitomized true heroism! Heroes die after they have blazed the trail! Heroes retire after they have done something unique and unthinkable! Heroes are heroes, regardless of their slips or the big or small things they could never do as heroes, for most times heroes die as heroes whilst challenging the unthinkable challenges! Even if all people don’t see and acknowledge the heroism of a hero, heroes see, feel and understand what it really takes to be a hero! A hero is a hero! Don’t ever undermine heroism!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: courageous-leadership, founders, great-men, greatness, heroes, heroism, leadership, pioneers

quote: Go the extra mile to do the undone, but work within your limits, and in doing so also, don’t be a coward to question things within your limit that are not all that right, and don’t be too arrogant or proud or be filled with excessive knowledge to do things which might though be within your limit, yet out of limit, for you must live and leave nothing, but distinctive and lasting footprints!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: arrogance, beyond-limit, excessive-knowledge, extra-duty, governance, leadership, pride

quote: A world without heroes is just an empty world! A world without heroes is just a world without great stories! There are heroes, and there are heroes! A hero takes steps with the vision of bringing what is beyond the eyes of mere men into reality for them to come to a certain realization. A hero opens doors for the eyes of mere men to see things inside the closed doors and ponder, learn lessons and think of different actions! A hero faces challenges in an overcoming manner with a certain charisma that surpasses the understanding of mere men! To be a hero, one needs a certain gut! It is not as if heroes don’t hit the rock bottom, never! Heroes meet big problems, but big problems and challenges are what define heroism, and even if heroes are unable to arrest and cripple all the challenges they meet, they must never be discredited for their awesome ingenuity that brought awe, became a yardstick, natured minds, provoked thoughts and caused the envy of mere men to shake, gave people reasons to reason, showed people the essence of life, cleared the path for people to take their journey, and epitomized true heroism! Heroes die after they have blazed the trail! Heroes retire after they have done something unique and unthinkable! Heroes are heroes, regardless of their slips or the big or small things they could never do as heroes, for most times heroes die as heroes whilst challenging the unthinkable challenges! Even if all people don’t see and acknowledge the heroism of a hero, heroes see, feel and understand what it really takes to be a hero! A hero is a hero! Don’t ever undermine heroism!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: courageous-leadership, founders, great-men, greatness, heroes, heroism, leadership, pioneers, thinkers, trail-blazers

quote: When you get the opportunity to lead, remember it is a noble opportunity not just to amass followers, but to nurture true and great leaders who can do even great things than you!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: followers, leadership, nurturing-purpose, responsibility-quotes

quote: Be a leader and be a transformer !When you get the opportunity to lead, remember it is a noble opportunity not just to amass followers, but to nurture true and great leaders who can do even greater things than you did! That never wipes off your footprints!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: followers, leadership, nurturing-purpose, responsibility-quotes, the-fear-of-leaders

quote: Not every gift must you stretch your hands to take! Sometimes, just put your hands by your side and humbly and courageously say thank you!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bribery, business-quotes, corruption, courage-to-say-no, gifts, integrity-quotes, leadership

quote: Though sometimes you must have an unstoppable courage, it must be with a well defined humility for purposeful living! Humility is not just good for our lives; it also greatly saves our lives, integrity and true purpose! Don’t just think you are on top of the world just because you stand on the tallest building. When the building collapses, you may be far worse than they that walk besides the building who can run away upon seeing it collapsing!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: humbleness, humility, humility-and-purpose, leadership

quote: A journey to make real impact that changes lives, give meaning to life and living, and turns vision of the masses into realities demands a true focus, an utmost zeal and robustness and an unfailing tenacity to do whatever necessary within the powers and reach of a true leader, and with all needed dexterity, wit and wisdom, to make real impact have a meaning and give real liberation to the masses!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: good-governance, governance, impact, leadership, liberation

quote: A true leader is the one who leaves memorable footprints of nobility. A leader who is decisive enough and have all the guts to take bold and frank decisions regardless of the oppositions and the temporal adverse effect of such decision on the masses, knowing that in the end, the fruits of such decision will be sweeter enough to put joy on the faces of the masses and they shall remember such noble footprints and ponder in humility.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: decisive-leaders, footprints, great-men, leadership, notable-people, true-leadership

quote: Great leaders live and leave noble and indelible footprints. Any leader can start something. Any leader can do anything but, the real hallmark and a great measure of a great leader is not necessarily what happens now but, what happens later. The noble works of a true and a great leader stand the test of time and never vanish with time.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-measure-of-leadership, diligence-quotes, do-it-to-the-end, footprints, good-leadership, great-leaders, leadership, life, nobility, true-leaders, visionary-leaders

quote: Accept it as it is and be true to yourself, the real answer is in you. It is about saying no to whom and what no is due and saying yes to whom and what yes is due! A simple solution to most of the problems of mankind today is just Yes and No!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: assertiveness, attitude-quotes, be-yourself-quote, bravery, diligence-quotes, fear, fearless-quotes, heart-issues, inspire-your-self, leadership, leadership-quotes, learn-to-say-no, love-issues, yes, yes-and-no

quote: When you get to the junction of double mindedness in purposefulness, remember the will of God.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: behaving-anyhow, christian-life, confusion-and-attitude, deciding-for-christ, know-your-vision, know-yourself-better, leadership, life, taking-a-decision, the-will-of-god, theology, thought, vision, wisdom-quotes

quote: anytime you speak to anybody, remember somebody
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: caution, gossip-quotes, leadership, life-and-living, life-lessons, life-philosophy, regrets, rumors, the-past

quote: A good artist does not just make imaginations beautiful to the mind, but also more pleasant to the eye with a superb visible touch of excellence.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: art, artistic-creativity, beauty-of-nature, creativity, imagination-quotes, vision-and-realities

quote: A good artist makes imaginations real!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: art, art-work, artist, culture, imaginations, perceptions

quote: When you read mistakes, learn from it!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: mistakes, reading

quote: Reading brings power to the mind and power brings freedom to the mind. Though you ought to read, read what is noble and worthy of not just your time, but your lifetime!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: good-reader, mind-your-mind, read-what-is-good, reading, wisdom

quote: If you read a book which does not make you wonder, ponder!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: good-books, motivation-to-read, reading, reading-for-life

quote: a town with more drinking joints than reading joints has a problem reading can solve
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: alcoholism, drinking-bars, drinking-quotes, fancy-things, happiness, ignorance, reading, societal-woes, the-power-of-reading

quote: Keep quiet and ponder! Speak and say something!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: intelligence, silence, speak-well, think-before-you-speak, think-well, thought

quote: The best way to make the true history a lasting legacy is to make it a lasting subject of learning
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: history, keeping-history-alive

quote: Grow past your past and march past the flag of the past!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: history, march-forward, past

quote: Photos of yesterday give good evidence of how yesterday was and they are a true prove of history!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: history, memories, old-photos, old-pictures, past-events, past-photos, photography-quotes

quote: It is only when people don’t know history well that they judge the present so blindly in ignorance!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: history, judging-by-appearance, understanding-life

quote: The day history will die and lose its essence with time, memories will not only die, but they shall also surely be forgotten with time!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: forgotten-memories, founders, history, ignorance-quotes, memories, the-past, time-and-essence

quote: He, who fails to acknowledge and appreciate the real courage of our fathers, fails to appreciate the real lessons that the courage of our fathers teaches us today! The courage and the wisdom that propelled our fathers to move unrelentingly in their days must be nothing to us, but, a real reason for us to be more than courageous enough to do the undone distinctively in our days.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: courage-quotes, dare, excellence, founding-fathers, history

quote: When we think carefully about the past, we get to know and understand not just what happened in the past but what really went into things that happened in the past.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bad-occurances, history, history-of-mankind, lessons-from-failures, lessons-from-history, lessons-from-mistakes, lessons-from-the-past, past-regrets, regrets, regrets-of-yesterday, relfections, sorrowful-times, the-past

quote: a great reason why a gloomy history may repeat itself is that we may have neglected what history did. When we neglect what history did, history visits us in the same cloth
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quotes, disaster-preparedness, elections, generational-problems, history, inspirational-quotes, lessons-from-history, lessons-from-the-past, neglected-lessons, politics, psyche, recurring-problems, war-and-conflict, words-of-wisdom

quote: A great paradox which should God make us understand, we will weep, laugh, wonder and ponder is the paradox of human ignorance
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-paradox, actions, human-acts, human-behavior, humanity, humor, ignorance-quotes, life, nature

quote: We wake up to be alive and to revive our lives; we don’t wake up to keep sleeping! We wake up not just to be alive, but also to keep our works alive and mind the business of the day! When you wake up, revive your work! Sometimes you may just feel reluctant to do something when day breaks, but you must remember that there is always something that needs to be done when day breaks, for each day we meet as we journey in life comes with its own agenda! He who fails to know the real reasons why day breaks shall always abuse the real and true essence of each day, knowingly or unknowingly! Be alive when you wake up and do something with all your might when day breaks for you surely leave a footprint each day you wake up! When you wake up, wake up!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: day-breaks, footsteps, good-morning-quotes, hard-work, idleness-quote, inspirational, laziness, laziness-quotes, wake-up, work

quote: A servant who serves excellently from his whole heart with due courage and humility is never a servant, but a master of his work!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: commitment-and-attitude, do-it-well, humility-is-a-good-friend, service, serving-others, work, work-and-happiness

quote: Be robust enough to work more than a robot!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: robotic-humans, robustness, strength-and-courage, work, zeal

quote: Life depends on you and your choices. The real value of your life largely depends on what you do with your life. You either move the world or the world moves you! You were born to either show the world why you were born or the world shows you why you were born, period!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accusers, destruction, essence-of-life, focus-on-your-dreams, make-a-difference, make-it-happen, purpose-of-life, reasons-for-living, stay-focused, the-value-of-life, work, you-can-do-it

quote: When we destroy the fertile lands, we destroy our own good life!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: destroying-nature, farming, fertile-lands, land, nature

quote: If men would understand and appreciate the good efforts that went into creation and how beautiful, good and awesome the creations were at the beginning, they would never think of undermining the Creators effort and integrity by destroying the beauty of nature! God is watching us!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: beauty-of-nature, environmental-degradation, environmental-protection, god-s-works, nature, rivers

quote: Real, true and unshakable peace comes from above. With such peace, you sleep soundly even in the midst of storm. With such peace, you smile and praise God even when you are in chains, for you get a very good understanding and conviction that the author of the peace is able to do all things exceedingly beyond understanding!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: faith-in-god, peace, peace-from-god, sound-mind, trust-in-god

quote: Sweep your mind and clean your heart, for these are the very places where things that make or mar our entire journey of life and living dwell! Sweep your mind and clean your heart, then you shall be free to be free and indeed have a true freedom! Sweep your mind and clean your heart, so you may have a clean mind and heart to be clean! Sweep your mind and clean your heart for not all things deserve a place in your heart and body! Sweep your mind and clean your heart, for in the end, so many things living in your heart and mind may never matter as part of the matters of your lifetime and life which really matter! Clean your heart and sweep your mind for certain people and things are in there only to disturb you for all the moments they shall continue to live there! Sweep your mind and clean your heart, for your body deserves nothing, but a clean mind and a clean heart daily for a daily fresh and refreshed body! Sweep your mind and clean your heart for there are so many toxic substances in our minds and hearts which we ponder over and over every day that weaken not just our hearts and minds every day, but our entire daily life and living! Sweep your mind and clean your heart for certain things deserve to live permanently in our hearts and minds so as to enable us live and leave distinctive footprints, and certain things deserve to leave our hearts and minds so that we can have a safe journey of life, and live and leave distinctive footprints in our journey of life!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: clean-heart, enmity, envy, free-heart, free-mind, hatred, heart-issues, life, living-life, living-well, love, mindset, peace, relations, sound-mind

quote: All things seek for comfort and no one wants discomfort. A sound mind does not just improve speed; it increases efficiency and joy, and bond the body and the soul perfectly as well!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: comfort, discomfort, peace, peace-of-mind, sound-mind

quote: When the world becomes peaceful for the birds, the birds will sing a harmonious chorale
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: children, life-quotes, peace, peace-of-mind-quotes, the-end-of-life, world-peace

quote: Let’s make the world brighter for that is all we need to be better! If I am bright and you are bright then the world will be brighterIf I am dark and you are dark then the world will be darkerLet’s make the world brighter for brightness is all we need to be better!Let’s make the world relevant for that is all we need to be relevantIf I am relevant and you are relevant then we shall all be relevantIf I am irrelevant and you are relevant then I will disturb your relevanceLet’s make the world relevant for that is the epitome of life!Let’s make the world faithful for faithfulness is all we need to be faithful!If I am faithful and you are faithful then the world will be faithfulIf I am unfaithful and you are faithful then I will disturb your faithfulnessLet’s make the world faithful for faithfulness is the fountain of peace
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-brighter-world, a-dark-world, a-peaceful-world, a-relevant-world, co-existing-peacefully, epitome-of-life, faithfulness, faithfulness-quotes, food-for-thought, inspirational-quotes, inspirational-words, life, love-quotes, our-relevance-on-earth, peace, thought, understanding-others, words-of-wisdom, world-peace

quote: God afflicts people for a reason
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: afflictions, distress, oppression-quotes, pain

quote: If only you would understand the silent speech and the real pain within the innermost man of they that suffer in silence, you would never keep silent to their suffering. So many people can’t speak everything about how they are suffering for the sake of dignity and confidentiality. Though they smile, they smile out of a deep pain within. When you look at someone suffering, just see how he is suffering and in so far as you can, be the joy to the innermost man of the person to the best of your ability. Don’t wait for his words, just look and see!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-good-heart, be-the-joy-of-others, giving, helping-the-needy, look-and-see, pain, sorrow-quotes, understanding-others

quote: Never ever seek for gratefulness from mankind, you shall always see ungratefulness. Do what you must do as a solemn duty and that is what you have to do!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-good-heart, appreciation, dignity-quotes, dishonesty, dishonor-quotes, do-what-you-must-do, expecting-others-to-forgive-you, expecting-thank-thank-you, life, love-for-all, love-for-humanity, pain, rejection, solemn-duty, thank-you, thankfulness, thanksgiving, ungrateful-people, ungratefulness

quote: If you take steps based on fantasies and illusions, you shall meet realities and remember the had I knows in sorrow
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: decide-well, facing-facts, facts, facts-and-ideas, facts-of-life, fantasies, had-i-know, imaginations, love, love-quotes, moving-on, pain, painful-past, patience, patience-and-timing, realities-of-life, regrets, sorrow, think-before-you-act, undersand-what-you-do, wrong-decisions

quote: when you meet the thickest darkness in life, pray for the brightest light.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: dark-days, good-life-quotes, life-afflictions, living-happily, mindset, pain, peace-in-storm, praying-for-strength, striving-for-a-better-future, thinking-a-lot, thinking-about-your-problems, thinking-with-a-great-mind

quote: until it is taken out of your mind, it is never lost and it is never gone
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: actions-over-words, betrayal, forgetfulness, joy, life, living-well, mindset, necessary-things, out-of-the-mind, pain, philosophy-of-life, psyche, sadness, science, the-past, thought, traumatic-experiences

quote: When we understand people; when we understand situations;when we understand what matters;when we understand the why’s, the what’s and the how’s;when we understand the trigger of actions, we least inflict pain on ourselves and unto others.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quote, daily-life, daily-living, hating-others, how, inspirational-quotes, living-in-harmony, living-well, love-quotes, loving-one-another, pain, peace-of-mind, reasons-for-action, understanding-life, understanding-love, understanding-oneself-and-others, understanding-others, what, why, wisdom-quotes

quote: Marriage is a great blessing, but it can be a great lesson
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: marital-problems, marriage, marriage-issues

quote: Don't you ever think that your mind can never harm you just because it is your mind! Your mind can really kill you. From dawn to the time you retire, your mind can be a very good friend to you and your mind can also be your worst friend. What goes into your mind each day becomes your friend so mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: control-your-mind, daily-quotes, inspirational-quote, loneliness, mindset, motivational-quotes, optimism, pessimism, rejoice, self-help, stay-happy, stop-worrying, think-well, when-you-wake-up, wisdom-quotes, worry

quote: Music brings relief! Hymns change mood! Songs empower the downhearted. Sing songs always! When all things seem down, sing a good and an inspiring song! When you seem to be wasting your energy on toxic thoughts, invoke your spirit with an amazing song! Songs have power! Empower your life with good songs!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: hymns, music, songs, toxic-in-the-mind

quote: A world without music is only filled with sounds in the air
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: direction-in-life, dreams-quotes, emptiness, focus, life, loneliness-quotes, love-quotes, music, purpose, reality-of-life, thought

quote: Wisdom is the spine of a business, money is its oxygen, and God is its strength and life.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: business-quotes, business-success, god, money

quote: Money can give the soul comfort, but it can never buy true, real and eternal life in Christ Jesus for the soul, and though it can make the soul lively, it can never guarantee its true eternal life in Christ!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: comfort, life, money, money-and-happiness, real-joy

quote: if you miss what seems so glamorous; if you miss what seems so fantastic to have, don't worry. It may be just a matter of fantasy to have it. Real things are rare but real to have. serendipity and the vicissitudes of life determine what is real, ideal and what is a fantasy. The real future is uncertain to all.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: determination, facing-realities, fantastic-things, fantasy, knowing-oneself, living-life-to-the-fullest, love, perplexities, serendipity, serendipity-quotes, staying-calm-to-life, the-real-future, uncertainties, what-is-ideal, you-may-never-know

quote: The world of fantasy can always blindfold. Had I know is a gateway to the realities of life
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: fantasy, had-i-know, life-lessons, life-realities, mistakes-learned, mistakes-quotes, realities, understanding-the-situation, when-things-go-wrong

quote: pulling a great substance from a higher height whilst leaning on a slippery ground with the mentality of having the substance whilst standing is a thought of fantasy. You may only result in falling with the substance
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: falling, fantasy, firmness, inspirational-quotes, misleading-notion, motivational-quotes, preparation, preparedness, psyche, wisdom-quotes

quote: Sometimes, how others look at it must not be how you should see it! Sometimes, how it means to others must not be how it should mean to you! Sometimes in life, things must have a different meaning to you, but positively; then you may be able to understand people and the mission, and accomplish the vision, with a good sense humor, seriousness and understanding, insight and wit, tenacity and distinctiveness, to the very end of your true strength!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-different-look, chances-in-life, do-it, focused, humor, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, look-and-see, mindset, motivational-quotes, time-will-tell, understanding

quote: Though not everything is so easy in doing, ponder before you say something is far difficult to do! When you think of the difficulty in getting it done, think and think again; you may have spent the same time you should have used for the utmost preparations that could have made the difficulty you look at but cannot see the panacea on something else, or you are not finding the necessary time, wit, courage, tenacity and the will power to release your whole and true self to master the very act and art of making difficult things easier!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: common-sense, difficult-moments, difficulties-of-life, do-it, easy-things, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, understanding, wasted-life, wasted-time, will-power, wisdom

quote: Wall your life, guard your heart and mind your mind! A life without a wall least blocks something! A mind without a wall accepts anything at all!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: assertiveness, attitude, guard-your-heart, inspirational-quotes, know-your-value, mind-your-mind, motivational-quotes, rules-of-life, think-well, thought, wisdom-quotes

quote: There are so many people who though can fight life and win greatly, yet they have imprisoned their own true strength and they just beg at the feet of defeat and miserable life, knowingly or unknowingly, at the expense of their true purpose! Awake whilst you have life and do something noble with all our might now!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: arise-and-shine, awake, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, slumber, strength-and-courage, strength-through-adversity, wake-up-call

quote: When your strength goes down, remember God is up to uplift you!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anxiety, christian-life, depression, emptiness, god, inspirational-quotes, meditations-quotes, motivational-quotes, prayer, words-of-encouragement

quote: He who doesn’t want to face his challenges shall always face challenges!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: do-something, facing-challenges, inspirational, motivational-quotes, overcoming-obstacles, words-of-wisdom

quote: He who doesn’t want to face his or her challenges shall always face challenges!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: do-something, facing-challenges, inspirational, motivational-quotes, overcoming-obstacles, words-of-wisdom

quote: The whole journey of life has been broken down into bits: days! Day by day we live life! Day by day we live and leave something behind; something good or something bad! Something mediocre or something noble! Until you know how to use your day, you may end your days and ponder over your days; how you used them and how you wasted them!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-new-day-quotes, daily-inspiration, footprints, inspirational-quotes, life, motivational-quotes, robust-and-focused, the-journey-of-life

quote: Growth is there for everybody, but it is not everybody who ‘grows’! So many people grow to stop growing, but aging never stops for mankind until we come to the ebb of our days! Grow in something as you grow and leave something unique!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: growth, inspirational-quotes, leave-a-legacy, motivational-quotes, wise-words

quote: Don’t ever sleep forever and don’t forever be at rest and leave the rest whilst you live though the journey of life can sometimes be so arduous! If you can’t run, crawl! If you do not want to crawl, walk! If you think walking will waste your time, gallop and if galloping is below your strength and true standard, dare to speed unrelentingly and dare to overcome all challenges! You shall always sleep or slumber only to wake up one day and realize the wide distance between you and they that crawled each second of time to the final destination of purposeful life and living unceasingly! Wake up each day and do something in the day!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: daily-inspiration, do-something-today, do-something-with-your-life, food-for-thought, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, purpose-driven-life, wise-words

quote: If you have life, smile and pursue life! Don’t keep your smile; keep smiling! We only need just one great thing in life, and that is life! All else are mere wants to gratify and beautify life. The real beauty of life is in having life and knowing what real life is all about!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: disappointment-quotes, frustration, inspirational-quotes, life, motivational-quotes, needs, real-life, realities, smile, wants, wisdom-quotes, worrying

quote: Each day that comes is not a privilege to think about wrong people and things in a negative way and disturb not just your mind, but your heart as well! Each day is however, a great privilege to be thankful to God and mind the business of your life; how to summon all challenges, limit your mistakes and improve your wit and wisdom, and how to move your footsteps to live noble and indelible footprints!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: annoyance, challenges-of-life, food-for-thought, footprints, inspirational-quotes, mistakes, motivational-quotes, priorities, think-positive, wisdom

quote: Each day that comes is not a privilege to think about wrong people and things in a negative way and disturb not just your mind, but your heart as well! Each day is however, a great privilege to be thankful to God and mind the business of your life; how to summon all challenges, limit your mistakes and improve your staying power, and how to move your footsteps to live noble and indelible footprints!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: annoyance, challenges-of-life, food-for-thought, footprints, inspirational-quotes, mistakes, motivational-quotes, priorities, think-positive, wisdom

quote: Things go wrong for a purpose. Just know the purpose, and just understand how to distinctively use the purpose for a great purpose!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bitter-situations, challenges, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, vision, when-thing-go-wrong, wisdom-quotes

quote: People always start with vigor, deep aspirations and inspirations, but things that happen as we journey and our reactions towards such things, fantasies and realities, determine the real robustness of our staying power and what distinctive thing we are able to do in reality with our vigor, aspirations and inspirations in the end!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-new-chapter-of-life, a-new-day-is-here, a-new-day-quotes, beginnings-and-endings, brainy-words, don-t-give-up, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, staying-power, the-end, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: Preparation is good for success and it is a noble thing to prepare excellently for success, but in reality, our choices, actions and reactions toward things we meet as we journey toward success are the real and true ingredients that determine how unsuccessful or successful we become and the kind of footprints we shall leave in the end!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: actions-and-reactions, attitude-towards-life, choices, choices-and-consequences, footprints, motivational-quotes, preparation-to-face-the-day, preparations, realities, success-quotes, the-journey-of-life, why-we-fail

quote: The world as an arena contains different tomorrows. When you see a different today, you shall think of a different yesterday and there shall come yet another and a different tomorrow! Day by day, night by night, we meet another tomorrow with different perspectives. If the good tomorrow you thought of becomes a bad today, don’t worry at all and pray, another tomorrow is coming for today to be yesterday! Don’t ever let desperation take the seat of inspiration within you! Keep Smiling, no matter what; for though all things go wrong, something is right somewhere! Just ponder, smile, be happy, shake of the dust and arise for another tomorrow is coming!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: despair-and-attitude, don-t-worry, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, move-on, tomorrow

quote: Be yourself! Don’t be somebody! Be humble to authority, but be assertive! Mind your solemn duty and responsibility to the Supreme God, for you shall give account to Him in the end! You were created uniquely, mind your mind! Mind the things that can change your mindset, and mind people! People are always alert to do all things possible to change your mind set. They wish you become the reason for their joy even if it causes you an inner pain! They wish you halt a purposeful journey. They wish you look and see, hear and listen, think and act, as they do! Their joy is to see you being like them, and their sorrow and envy is to see you living your true you! Be yourself! If only you living your true you please God, no problem exists! Just be yourself and mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-yourself, envy-and-attitude, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, wisdom-quotes

quote: You are alone because you were born alone. And though you were born alone, you found a reason and the strength to shake yourself, though as helpless as you were at birth, for the whole universe to hear and know that you have not just arrived, but you are healthy, and you commended and moved things and people around you with your cry, even as an infant! And though it all seems you are alone, note that once you can breathe, you are never alone! Smile, for there is an indomitable power within you, given to you by God! Realize your God, realize your power! Awake and realize your true strength and the strong power within you! Face life and do not just challenge the challenges in life but conquer them with all boldness and fortitude. Step by step, complete the steps! It is always not all that easy, but, be strong and beat life no matter what!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-bold, be-strong-and-positive, inspira, loneliness-of-life, motivational-quotes, optimism, pessimist, solitude-quotes, strength-through-adversity, wisdom-quotes

quote: Strive through your adversities with a tenacious mindset and a sincere heart and there shall surely be a great end when you get to the end unrelentingly. You shall surely leave a noble mark when you endure to the end and you shall surely smile in the end and ponder over how the journey to the end was. Note; there is no sweet fruit that is not the product of the dirty soil. No matter what, keep moving on!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quotes, confidence, difficult-times, inspirational-quotes, lack, mindset, motivational-quotes, perplexities, persistence-quotes, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: You are alone because you were born alone. And though you were born alone, you found a reason and the strength to shake yourself, though as helpless as you were at birth, for the whole universe to hear and know that you have not just arrived, but you are healthy, and you commanded and moved things and people around you with your cry, even as an infant! And though it all seems you are alone, note that once you can breathe, you are never alone! Smile, for there is an indomitable power within you, given to you by God! Realize your God, realize your power! Awake and realize your true strength and the strong power within you! Face life and do not just challenge the challenges in life but conquer them with all boldness and fortitude. Step by step, complete the steps! It is always not all that easy, but, be strong and beat life no matter what!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-bold, be-strong-and-positive, inspira, loneliness-of-life, motivational-quotes, optimism, pessimist, solitude-quotes, strength-through-adversity, wisdom-quotes

quote: When our expectations differ from better, we think bitter, but that is not better! Stay better, think positive, no matter what; there is always a better lesson to learn!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bitter-life, bitterness-and-hatred, expectations, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, stay-better

quote: You have abundant dexterity and the power to do such wonderful things in you and it is only you who can bring out the marvelous works within to reality to the awesome amazement of all. You shall always think about them and they shall always be within you until you take steps to make them happen in reality. Awake and do something!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: arise-and-do-something, arise-and-shine, capabilities-quotes, competence, inspirational-quotes, life, make-it-happen, motivational-quotes, take-charge-of-your-own-world, the-power-in-you, the-value-in-you, thinking, waiting-to-start, wisdom-quotes, you-can-do-it

quote: Awake! there is always a reason to give up and there is always a reason to soldier on unrelentingly. Don't give up so easily on a true purpose just because you perceive an arduous errand. Arise for you can do something to overcome something! Look beyond what you look and awaken your inner man. Move! And you shall surely see a fabulous end!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: act, attitude-quotes, be-bold, don-t-give-up, don-t-quit, go, inspirational-quotes, keep-doing-it, keep-moving-forward, motivational-quotes, tenacity, words-of-wisdom

quote: Time changes therefore think about the changing times. You shall always have time to think about the time for your plans and you shall always plan your lifetime. Plans can change the meaning of time and time can change the real meaning and essence of plans. Time is mutable so plan your time and time your plans for time changes
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: act-your-plans, action-quotes, changing-times, choices, daily-inspiration, life, motivational-quotes, planning, plans, thought, time, time-management-quotes, wisdom-quotes

quote: God is not all that interested in your grammar. He is interested in the meaning of your grammar!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accountability-time, brainy-quotes, do-it-at-any-age, do-it-well, do-something, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, talent-quotes, the-meaning-of-life, why-we-live, wise-words, work-hard

quote: Life is never a static journey. Life goes on! Life is about step taking. For everything I need to know about life, I need to take a step
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: challenges-quotes, do-something, don-t-give-up, inspirational-quotes, life, make-a-move, motivational-quotes, take-a-step, tenacity, time, timidity

quote: When the drum beat comes to an end, you shall not hear the drum beat again, but you shall remember how it sounded, and you shall understand clearly how you should or should not have danced to the drum beat
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: african-wisdom, decision-making, drum-beat, inspirational-quotes, love-quotes, motivational-quotes, regrets, taking-steps, understanding-the-past, wise-sayings, wise-words, words-of-wisdom

quote: Your day was never bad. If you think you had a bad day, check your mindset!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-bad-day, be-happy-with-your-life, depression-quotes, facing-challenges, facing-problems, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, negative-thinking, stay-happy-always, think-well, wisdom-quotes, wise-quotes

quote: the severe pain and the great trials we go through teach us the real essence of great joy
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-happy-with-yourself, depression-quotes, happiness-quotes, inspirational-quotes, joy, joyful-living-quotes, motivational-quotes, sorrow-quotes, storms-of-life, suffering, trials-of-life, trying-times, wise-sayings, words-of-wisdom

quote: the sever pain and the great trials we go through teach us the real essence of great joy
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-happy-with-yourself, depression-quotes, happiness-quotes, inspirational-quotes, joy, joyful-living-quotes, motivational-quotes, sorrow-quotes, storms-of-life, suffering, trials-of-life, trying-times, wise-sayings, words-of-wisdom

quote: come on, you shouldn't continue to disturb your mind with everything. Avoid thinking about anything at all, leave something, keep something and think about something!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, bad-times, be-happy, confusion, depression-quotes, humorous-quotes, inspirational-quotes, life-quotes, loneliness-quotes, motivational-quotes, sorrow-quotes, stay-focused, staying-positive, thought, wisdom-quotes

quote: The real value of money is never the value of money but the value money can acquire. The real value of our lives is not just the value of our lives but, the distinctive value our lives can build in the end!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-good-manager, brainy-quotes, do-something-with-your-life, food-for-thought, inspirational-quotes, make-a-difference, make-each-day-count, money-quotes, motivational-quotes, the-best-options-in-life, the-end-of-life, the-essence-of-life, the-value-of-life, the-value-of-money, the-value-of-time, time, words-of-wisdom

quote: You least obtain something great from the great thing you regard as least though such great thing can give you something great
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: demeaning, dignity, disrespectful-people, doubt, doubt-quotes, faith, life, life-lessons, motivational-quotes, respecting-others, words-of-wisdom

quote: a paradox; the best opportunities we want are the best opportunities we miss; the best opportunities we wanted, are the best opportunities we missed and the best opportunities we seek for stay far away from us. In the end, we only settle for any opportunity. Life!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anything-can-be, anything-goes, chances, inspirational-quotes, love-quotes, missed-opportunities, motivational-quotes, opportunities, opportunity-quotes, paradox-of-life

quote: if you think you know all that somebody knows, you shall least know all that somebody knows. If you think you least know all that somebody knows, you shall really know all that somebody knows.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: arrogance-and-attitude, arrogance-quotes, attitude-quotes, food-for-thought, humble-beginnings, humble-spirit, humble-yourself, humbleness, humility, ignorance, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, ponder, pride, think-about-it, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: We yearn for opportunities, we pray for opportunities and we seek for opportunities. The good news is that we meet opportunities. The bad news is that we miss the opportunities only to come to a later realization of missed opportunities.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: gone-opportunities, inspirational-quotes, job-search, lessons-of-life, lost-opportunities, love-quotes, missed-chances, missed-opportunities, missing-you-quotes, motivational-quotes, opportunity-quotes, regrets, regrets-of-the-past, take-chances, take-opportunities, vigilance, wisdom-quotes

quote: if you cannot find the distinctive opportunities you want, you can create the distinctive opportunities you want but you can't find!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, do-something-unique, idle-thoughts, idleness-quote, inspirational-quotes, life, look-and-see, motivational-quotes, opportunities-in-life, opportunities-missed, opportunity-quotes, regret-quotes, see-opportunities, think-differently, time, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: The good news is that you are alive. The essential thing is that you must live
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: daily-quotes, do-your-best, footprints, footprints-in-life, leave-a-legacy, life-lessons, living, living-life, living-life-to-the-fullest, motivational-quotes, where-are-you-heading-towards, words-of-inspiration, words-of-motivation, words-of-wisdom

quote: Mind and man what is in today and make today the solid foundation for tomorrow. Focus on what tomorrow brings ans let yesterday be yesterday. If there are lessons to learn from yesterday, don’t neglect them and don’t be crippled by the negativity of yesterday; Only use them as the best panacea and antidote to the ‘had I knows’ of tomorrow you are yet to meet!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anxiety-quotes, be-wise, brainy-words, had-i-know, inspirational-quotes, lessons-of-life, motivational-quotes, plan-for-a-better-future, stay-focused, thought, today-is-your-day, today-quotes, tomorrow-quotes, words-of-wisdom, yesterday-quotes

quote: You left yesterday hoping to see tomorrow and you shall surely see today so far us you have life. Mind and man what is in today and make today the solid foundation for tomorrow. Focus on what tomorrow brings and let yesterday be yesterday. If there are lessons to learn from yesterday, don’t neglect them and don’t be crippled by the negativity of yesterday; only use them as the best panacea and antidote to the ‘had I knows’ of tomorrow you are yet to meet!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-new-day-is-here, a-new-day-quotes, food-for-thought, footprints, had-i-know, inspirational-quotes, life, life-lessons, make-good-use-of-the-day, motivational-quotes, reasons-to-live, regrets, stay-focused, stay-positive, think-well, thought, today-quotes, tomorrow-quotes, use-your-time-well, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom, yesterday-quotes

quote: You shall only continue to feel bitter when you continue to make your mind the door step for footprints of bitterness! When you mind your mind, you mind your mind, you mind your heart, you mind your body and you mind your spirit! The only rest stop in your body for bitterness is your mind. Don’t forget! mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-happy, depression-quotes, inspitaional, life-lessons, motivational-quotes, negative-thinking, optimism, optimism-quotes, pessimism, philosophy, psychology-quotes, stay-positive, the-mind, think-well, thinking-positive, thought, wisdom-quotes

quote: You shall only continue to feel bitter when you continue to make your mind the doorstep for footprints of bitterness! When you mind your mind, you mind your mind, you mind your heart, you mind your body and you mind your spirit! The only rest stop in your body for bitterness is your mind. Don’t forget! Mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-happy, bitterness, depression-quotes, footprints, footprints-of-bitterness, inspitaional, life-lessons, motivational-quotes, negative-thinking, optimism, optimism-quotes, pessimism, philosophy, psychology-quotes, stay-positive, the-mind, think-well, thinking-positive, thought, wisdom-quotes

quote: Until you learn how to confidently say NO to so many things, you shall always say YES to so many things. The real summary of a regretful life is a life that failed to balance YES and NO. Yes! A life that failed to recognize when to courageously say NO and when to confidently say YES!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: assertiveness, attitude-quotes, be-who-you-are, confidence-and-attitude, courage-quotes, don-t-accept-anything, inspirational-quotes, know-what-you-want, lessons-of-life, live-well, love-quotes, motivational-quotes, regret-free-life-quotes, regrets, saying-no, saying-yes, think-before-you-do, thought, wisdom-quotes

quote: An awesome thing children need is a frank smile from a sincere heart
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: children, life, love-children, love-for-life, motivational-quotes, quotes-about-children, smile-quotes, the-needs-of-children, what-children-want, wisdom-quotes

quote: for me, to say I yet to begin gives me reasons not to look back and see what I have done but ,to look ahead and see, understand and plan for what I am yet to do
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-new-start, begin-afresh, complacency, do-something-new, do-something-today, don-t-feel-relaxed, don-t-give-up-quotes, greatness, inspirational-quotes, mediocre-people, mediocrity, meditation, motivational-quotes, philosophy-of-life, planning-ahead, planning-strategically, tenacity-quotes, think-ahead-of-time, wisdom-quotes

quote: The real duty of a motivational speaker and an inspirational writer must be to inspire lives to live and leave distinctive footprints which shall qualify such lives to eternal eternity in the Kingdom of God notwithstanding how minute or great the footprints might be
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-life, christian-quotes, duty-of-motivational-speakers, eternal-eternity, eternal-life, focus-on-christ, inspirational-writers, life, motivational-quotes, motivational-speakers, wisdom-quotes

quote: for me, to say that I am yet to begin gives me the real reason not to look back and see what I have done but, to look ahead and see, understand and plan for what I am yet to do
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-new-start, begin-afresh, complacency, do-something-new, do-something-today, don-t-feel-relaxed, don-t-give-up-quotes, greatness, inspirational-quotes, mediocre-people, mediocrity, meditation, motivational-quotes, philosophy-of-life, planning-ahead, planning-strategically, tenacity-quotes, think-ahead-of-time, wisdom-quotes

quote: There shall always be a day and a night until the world meets its ebb and we shall always hope to sleep and wake up to see another day! Such is called life! So many people have life, but, few people are living. We shall continue to exist from dawn to dusk having life and living or just having life!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accountability, day-and-night, do-your-best, goodmorning-quotes, inspirational-quotes, life, life-and-living, live-well-in-the-day, living-life-to-the-fullest, motivational-quotes, reasons-why-we-live, time-management-quotes, use-your-time-well, wisdom-quotes

quote: When people leave you, identify why they left and think about what is left
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: death, depature, inspirational-quotes, life, life-lessons, loneliness-of-life, loneliness-quotes, motivational-quotes, when-people-leave-you, wisdom-quotes

quote: Suppose that we could close our eyes today and see the real certainties and uncertainties of tomorrow, we would have never wished to open our eyes again for the real certainties and uncertainties of tomorrow never ends!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bad-times, certainties, good-times, inspirational-quotes, life, life-lessons, motivational-quotes, no-one-knows-tomorrow, the-end, thought, tomorrow-quotes, trials-of-life, uncertainties-of-tomorrow, what-is-in-tomorrow, what-tomorrow-brings, wisdom-quotes

quote: You wake up for a reason, you eat for a reason, you dress for a reason and you sleep for a reason. All we do run on the pivot of reasons. For what reasons do you fear? For what reasons do you think? For what reasons do you talk? For what reasons do you open that door each day? For what reasons do you love? For what reasons do you hate? Until we get the reasonable reasons to reason, we shall always ponder over the reasons why we reasoned or we could not reason.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: inspirational-quotes, living-a-great-footprint, living-well-quotes, making-good-decisions, making-good-use-of-the-day, motivational-quotes, ponder, psyche, reasonable-reasons, reasoning, reasons, reasons-for-action, reasons-for-living, why-that-act, why-we-read

quote: Let it be a footprint that you ones lived!Let it be a footprint that you thought failure a lesson!Let it be a footprint that you were stronger than life hurdles!Let it be a footprint that your speech was awesome!Let it be a footprint that you left a distinctive mark on minds!Let it be a footprint that you were the best father ever!Let it be a footprint that a great mother once lived !Let it be a footprint that once lived a humble yet an assertive you!Let it be a footprint that you stood for what is just regardless of the odds!Let it be a footprint that you fed the hungry! Let it be a footprint that you protected the vulnerable!Let it be a footprint that you lived for Christ!Let it be a footprint that you were courageous and not a coward!Let it be a footprint that a great worker is gone!Let it be a footprint that a good heart is gone!Let it be a footprint that you were a noble accomplisher !Let it be a footprint that you knew the essence of time!Let it be a footprint that you knew when to ignore and when to respond!Let it be a footprint! Let it be a footprint! Let it be a footprint!Let it be a footprint that though you are leaving, you are living!Let it be a footprint that you shall be missed!What footprint are you leaving behind?
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: best-life, blazing-a-trail, brainy-quote, courage-quotes, cowardice, deeds, distinct-footprints, facing-life, footprints-of-life, good-speech, great-advice, inspirational-quotes, lessons-of-life, living-well, living-well-quotes, motivational-quotes, stories-of-failure, stories-of-success, strength-through-adversity, the-essence-of-life, the-reasons-to-live, uniqueness

quote: question the status quo; rebuke the existing rules, though it may be at the discomfort of the masses. They may however come to a later realization that it was really worth it and you may now have the status quo
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: daring, doing-the-right-thing, facing-problems, inspirational-quotes, lessons-of-life, living-well, mediocrity, motivational-quotes, purposefulness, refusing-to-give-up, relivance-of-our-existence, resilience, the-status-quo, wisdom-quotes, wit

quote: We must live a life that is not geared towards living today but our existence after existing and exiting the earth. We must think of our footprints that will long exist after our existence come to its ebb. We must get reasons for existing. For what reasons are you existing?
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: beyond-life, footprints, footprints-in-life, knowing-your-worth, life-after-death, life-lessons, life-philosophy, living-good, living-life, motivational-quotes, reasons-for-existing, reasons-for-living, wisdom-quotes

quote: if you give people the reasons to reason and you don't reason, reason!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: helping-others-deal-with-stress, helping-others-in-need, helping-people, inspirational-quotes, inspiring-to-inspire, learning-to-be-a-master, learning-to-shine, living-well, look-to-your-self-first, loving-others, motivational-quotes, purposefulness, reasons, self-awareness, self-improvement

quote: you may meet opportunities; you may miss opportunities; you may create opportunities. Opportunities may recur; opportunities may be equivalent but not equal. For the sake of the vicissitudes of life and the mutability of time, watch your time
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: assertiveness, changing-situations, good-life-quotes, life-ups-and-downs, love-quotes, missed-opportunities, motivational-quotes, mutability, opportunities, opportunities-in-lifeliving-well, regret-free-life, regrets, sadness, staying-alert, time-changes, time-wasting, using-opportunities, wisdom-quotes

quote: it may seem so easy to take it easy but, it is never so easy to take it easy
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: difficulties, motivational-quotes, psyche, resilience, take-it-easy, tenacity, wisdom-quotes

Let it be a footprint! Let it be a footprint!Let it be a footprint that though you are leaving, you are living!Let it be a footprint that you shall be missed!What footprint are you leaving behind?

quote: if you cannot get it all right, don't get it all wrong
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quotes, common-mistakes, doing-it-right, get-it-all-right, get-it-all-wrong, get-it-right, good-works, inspirational-quotes, life, mistakes-quotes, motivational-quotes

quote: So many people live life without knowing the life they are living. We must get a reasonable reason for living
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: best-life, confusion, essence-of-life, motivational-quotes, purposefulness, reason-for-living, reasons, reasons-to-live, wandering, wandering-life, wandering-thoughts

quote: The strength of a man is less of the man and much more of who and what backs the man.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, psyche, strength-and-courage, strength-of-character, support, supporting-others

quote: We all do think of getting to the ultimate in life.The ultimate way to get to the ultimate is to take the ultimate way in life
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-living, life, motivational-quotes, psyche, purposeful-living, purposefulness, the-way-of-kings, the-way-the-truth-and-the-life, thought, ultimate, ultimate-reality, wisdom-quotes

quote: Tenacity is what it takes to dare unrelentingly
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: daring, daring-quotes, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, psyche, tenacity, the-arduous-errand

quote: A thousand minus one is never a thousand
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: inspirational-quotes, inspiring-quotes, motivational-quotes, psyche, the-arduous-errand, thousand, together-forever, unity, unity-in-the-church

quote: great men take and overtake risk tactically
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quote, courage, daring-and-living, daring-quotes, great-men, greatness-quotes, motivational-quotes, psyche, reasoning, risk, risk-taking, tenacity, wisdom, wisdom-quotes

quote: sometimes in your works, give people the opportunity to express their ignorance; then you prove the wrong with your works.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-toward-life, criticism, deft, dexterity, ignore-ignorance, inspirational-quotes, lessons-of-life, life, love, motivational-quotes, patience, people, psyche, purpose-driven-life, self-acceptance-quotes, thought

quote: we may experience an absolute positive change and do the undone if we shift our thoughts from descriptive thinking to prescriptive thinking
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: life, mind, mind-power, purpose, thoughts

quote: You must never forget these three things when you have comfort: enjoy it, but with care; let it be truly relevant to lives as a true service to God; and leave noble and lasting footprints with it that will inspire, bring relief and serve as a lasting epitome of goodness to your next generation!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: comfort, power, remember-somebody, riches, wealth-quotes

quote: The power of ignorance can make a powerful man look powerless
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: inherent-value, know-your-worth, power, self-identity, self-value

quote: Before you attack the porcupine, think of its quills!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attacking-others, challenge, competition, diligence, power, strength, wisdom

quote: The power of words is in the works of words. People are much more bonded by the works of words than words. The work of words is the trigger of words.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bonds, changing-ourselves, changing-people, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, power, power-of-words, power-of-words-forgetting, psyche, trigger, wisdom-quote, words

quote: By all means, somebody will oppose it, but if only it is a noble cause pleasant to God, you have no reason to retreat!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: courage, do-it-to-the-end, opposition

quote: A world without heroes is only a world with either mere men or men with wit and courage who never had the courage to take steps that could write great and amazing stories of life!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: courage, heroes, wisdom-quotes

quote: There is one thing you must always remember about yourself; always be yourself, with courage and humility, no matter what!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-yourself-quotes, boldness-and-attitude, courage, humility-quotes, mindset, passion, pride

quote: I have a lightA light that guides my sightI have a lightA light that brightens my nightI have a lightA light that makes me a knightI have a lightI have a lightOh yes! I have a lightI have a light!Christ Jesus my LightI have a lightI light that raises me highI have a light A light that makes me see farI have a lightA light that makes me a lightI have a lightI have a lightOh yes! I have a lightI have a light!Christ Jesus my LightI have a lightA light that makes me rightI have a lightA light that makes me wiseI have a lightA light that makes me brightI have a lightI have a lightOh yes! I have a lightI have a light!Christ Jesus my Light
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
