quote: when you courageously believe in the power of doubt instead of the power of God, you much see the works of doubt and least see the works of God
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: believe-in-god, courage, courage-quotes, doubt, doubting-god, doubting-mind, doubting-thomas, faith-quotes, results-of-doubting, the-power-of-god, the-works-of-god

quote: until we courageously find a cheaper antidote to our ignorance, we shall always pay a higher price for our ignorance courageously.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: courage, ignorance, lessons-in-life, lessons-learned, life, mistakes, mistakes-we-make, price-of-dialogue, purpose-driven-life

quote: if people do not understand you outrightly, do not worry; understand people outrightly and act with wisdom, courage and understanding
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: confidence, courage, letting-go-of-the-past, life, moving-on-and-letting-go, psyche, understanding-life, understanding-oneself, understanding-others, worry

quote: being genius does not necessarily means knowing it all or having the highest academic qualification but a persons ability to apply wisdom and common sense to common things in a distinctive manner and courageously exhibiting the latent deft to the admiration of the masses
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: academics, courage, deft, genius, purpose

quote: When your attention is for the most important things, you mind the most important things! Give your attention to the most important things, and don't let anything at all get you thinking about anything! Have a true passion for living; you are here to accomplish a true mission!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attention, life, passion

quote: There is no short cut to success, but there are guidelines to success!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, greatness-in-you, humility-in-greatness, passion, success-quotes, the-journey-to-success

quote: I am not in pursuit of wealth, neither am I in want of fame! I am not after applauds that shall turn into slaps after a least slip. I do not need absolute acceptance or absolute rejection; neither am I after a total approval nor disapproval! I am in pursuit of wisdom! I am in pursuit of a true and a solemn dignity; I am in pursuit of nurturing a true and a great destiny in my journey to the final destination! I do not seek for carnal reward, but if the world will reward me, it shall be for good; If the world will accept who I am as I am and what I stand for, fine, if not, I only look up to my Heavenly Father to accomplish a solemn duty for a solemn reward!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: food-for-thought, fulfillment, greatness-quotes, impact-makers, inspirational-quotes, living-life, passion, purpose-driven-life, reasons-for-living, responsibility, rewards, wisdom-quotes, wishes

quote: When passion dies, reasons dwindle
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: life-quotes, passion, reasons, urge

quote: Life is a journey of tenacity. Only the tough gets to the top through the storm. Take the steps one by one though the errand may be arduous. Never give up though you may grow weary. Think of the purpose though its attainment may be tough. Dare to get to the crown though you may meet the obstacles. You are never born to relax all day but to dare to do the undone. If only it is reasonable enough within the real reasons of your life, and if your soul and spirit convince you of getting it done, then, you have the real reasons to dare for the crown.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attaining-the-goals, daring-life, daring-to-do, difficult-moments, don-t-die-with-your-purpose, errand-of-life, getting-it-done, life-through-the-storms, never-give-up, never-give-up-on-your-dreams, passion, purpose-of-life-quotes, pursue-your-passion, pursuing-your-dream-with-faith, reasons-for-action, relaxing, relaxing-the-mind, tenacity, the-arduous-errand, wisdom-to-do

quote: We all think of doing something distinctive in life. We all do dream of becoming great and leaving distinctive footprints but, when we get that dream, we must get a clear understanding of what it takes to be great. We must get the real picture of what it takes to live and leave distinctive footprints. We need to understand the real reasons why we must pursue to the end notwithstanding how arduous the journey to greatness may be and the tangible and intangible costs we may have to pay. We must have a nimble mind, move with tenacity and dare without retreating. Though we may be ignorant of the certainty, uncertainty and serendipity we may meet, we must think ahead! Vision shall always be a vision until we take that step of fortitude to make it a reality. When you dream of what is distinctive, make it happen!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: beyound-the-limit, brainy-words, dare, do-extra, do-it, do-something, do-something-distinctive, do-something-today, do-something-unique, don-t-give-up, dream-big, fortitude, learn-to-do-something, make-it-happen, reality, reality-quotes, serendipity-quotes, the-journey-to-greatness, think-well, thought, troubles-quotes, uncertainty, vision, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: When you always stay positive, you least worry yourself over anything at all! You only take lessons from negative moments of life, and people who seek to change your positive nature to negative! Don’t ever allow your life to be negative just because of people, things and negative occurrences in life, not even for a brief moment! You are you! You are a positive person; stay positive and be happy!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: don-t-worry, negative-thoughts, optimism, pessimism, positive-thinking, stay-positive

quote: The ultimate change one can ever seek for is a change in thought. A change in thought is a change in body
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-towards-life, body-mind-spirit, change, change-your-life, inspirational-quotes, positive-thinking, psyche, wisdom-quotes

quote: Discomfort: the valley between the body and the soul. Comfort: the bridge between the body and the soul
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: comfort, comfortable-life, discomfort, discomfort-quotes, discomfort-with-self, finding-comfort, joy, joyful-living, life-and-living, perplexity, sorrow

quote: The wealth of some people is here on earth. The wealth of other people is somewhere afar from the earth. Whatever the wealth may be, we must think of a wealth that is distinctive
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: distinctive-footprints, joy, joy-of-life, life-after-death, living-well-quotes, material-gains, poverty, riches, thought, wealth, wealth-creation

quote: Sometimes we learn the lessons of life through pain, melancholy and the vicissitude of life and sometimes we learn the lessons of life through joy and comfort. Whatever the case may be, the most important thing is the great lesson we learn out of the lessons life teaches us. If you fail to learn the lessons greatly, life will teach you a great lesson.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-difficult-year, changes-in-time, comfort, comfort-zone, difficult-times, failure, failure-quotes, joy, learning-the-lessons, life-changes, melancholy, suffering, vicissitude-of-life, what-life-teaches-us

quote: Sometimes we learn the lessons of life through pain, melancholy and the vicissitude of life and sometimes we learn the lessons of life through joy and comfort. Whatever be the case, the most important thing is the great lesson we learn out of the lessons life teaches us. If you fail to learn the lessons greatly, life will teach you a great lesson.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-difficult-year, changes-in-time, comfort, comfort-zone, difficult-times, failure, failure-quotes, joy, learning-the-lessons, life-changes, melancholy, suffering, vicissitude-of-life, what-life-teaches-us

quote: The real you is not you, the real you is what is within you. What is behind your joy or your melancholy. What gives you the reason to ponder. What moves or stops you. What makes you you is you.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: decision-making, joy, lessons, life-in-reality, ponder, ponder-to-wonder, pondering, sadness, sadness-and-happiness, sadness-quotes, the-essence-of-life, the-real-you, what-makes-you-you, what-moves-you

quote: death is a joyous journey for the purposeful life and a melancholy for the mediocre life
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: inspirational-attitude, inspirational-quotes, joy, joy-of-life, life-well-lived, motivational-quotes, purpose, purpose-of-life, purpose-of-living

quote: Look behind you! Can you see yesterday? Look ahead of you! Can you see tomorrow? Yesterday is gone; tomorrow is yet to come! Learn from yesterday and plan for tomorrow, but be happy with your today, for that is all you have! Work hard with diligence in it and do your best to make it the best today! You may never have another wonderful day like today! If it is a rough day, work hard to be an over comer in the day, and that will make your story for the day a wonderful one! If it is a comfortable day, enjoy it and invest in it for a lasting tomorrow’s comfort for you least know what in reality is ahead of you! Build a solid tomorrow today! Today is today; use it well!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: inspirational-quotes-about-life, motivational-quotes-for-life, tomorrow-quotes, wisdom-quotes, yesterday-quotes

quote: Take your time to find and understand what you don’t know and in the end, you shall know that it is not all the things you know that shows you something you don’t know, but something you don’t know!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: knowledge-quotes, lack-of-knowledge, what-you-don-t-know, wisdom-quotes, wise-words

quote: Take your time to find, know and understand what you don’t know and in the end, you shall know that it is not all the things you know that show you something you don’t know, but something you don’t know!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: get-understanding, knowledge-quotes, lack-of-knowledge, seek-wisdom, self-confidence, what-you-don-t-know, wisdom-quotes, wise-words

quote: Do not go for conformity that breeds mediocrity! Choose instead to stand for transformation that does not only transforms lives, but true purpose and living as well.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: assertiveness, challenges-quotes, conformity, living-life, mediocre-people, mediocrity-quotes, opportunity-quotes, oppositions-to-great-purpose, plans, wisdom-quotes, wise-words

quote: The author of true, real and rare wisdom is God; ask Him!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: true-wisdom, trust-in-god, wisdom-quotes

quote: No mountain is too high, but so many people can't climb even a hill. There is always a way to the top, but so many people can't even get the mid and many miss the way. Life is real and the journey of life comes with rules. Mind the real and distinctive rules that lead to success and you shall get to the very peak of the mountain of success surmounting all barriers, challenges and puzzles along the journey to success with a great degree of ease!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: advice-for-daily-living, attitude, challenges, difficulties, failure-quotes, food-for-thought, humor, inspirational-quotes, life, obey-the-rules, realities-of-life, success, wisdom-quotes

quote: I rather choose to go through what will make me humble than to go for what will increase my pride to a level without limit
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: choose-humility, difficulties, difficulties-of-life, humility, life-matters, obedience-quotes, stay-humble, thought, wisdom-quotes, words

quote: We can hardly get to the very far for the very far we can think of is the far we have not yet reach
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accomplish-your-aspirations, complacency, inspirational-quotes, mistakes, tenacity-quotes, the-extra-mile, the-undone, there-is-more-to-be-done, thoughts, unfinished-business, unfinished-task, vision, wisdom-quotes

quote: the pen is as wise as the mind that speaks through it
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: food-for-thought, great-minds, humor, leadership-quotes, learning, the-pen, wisdom-quotes, wise-sayings

quote: You know what? Yesterday will never come back. Close your eyes and see something! You shall neither see yesterday nor tomorrow. Open your eyes and you shall see today! Open your eyes to realities then! Today is all you have to make the change! Today is the day you have to prepare for a better tomorrow. Arise and see! Today is the day you have to make the best use of the lessons of yesterday! Open your eyes and see today! Today is all you have to make a change. Awake and see why you have today! Arise and realize why you woke up today! Make today your day!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: arise-and-shine, awake, do-something, footprints-of-life, inspirational-quotes, lessons-of-life, make-each-day-count, thought, today-is-your-day, understanding-life, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: Sometimes in life, you may take a step, only to realize the steps you missed. Sometimes in life, you may delay a step taking, only to see a step you shouldn’t have miss. Notwithstanding the results of your steps, you still ought to take steps. Life keeps moving and you can’t afford to be static! Keep on moving on!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: dare-to-dream, food-for-thought, keep-moving-forward, mistakes-quotes, paradox-of-life, reasoning, regrets, stay-focused, step-by-step, step-taking, the-past, vision, wisdom-quotes, wise-words

quote: If the body dies, life ends! If the body is disturbed, life is disturbed. If the mind is not sound, everything least sound well to the mind! Mind your body; mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: eating-habits, good-health, inspirational-quotes, life, mind-your-diet, peace-of-mind, sound-mind, sound-mind-in-a-sound-body, think-well, wisdom-quotes, wise-words, words-of-inspiration

quote: A static action is never an action. A real action is an action in motion! Dare to do something!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action, action-in-motion, attitude-quotes, brainy-quotes, do-something, food-for-thought, inspirational-quotes, life-lessons, live-your-best-life, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: Wise men are wise yet their actions always seem otherwise to others who always think of the otherwise
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: negative-people, negative-thoughts, optimism-quotes, pesimism, real-life, the-otherwise, wisdom, wisdom-quotes, wise-men

quote: a crooked truth is far straight than a straight lie
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: decision-making, decision-quotes, disappointment, dishonesty, double-mindedness, double-standards, facts-of-life, food-for-thought, honesty, inspirational-quotes, ponder, realities, the-truth, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: We can never skip growing old. As we grow older, we understand old things and things of old times better!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: aging-quotes, experience-quotes, humor, inspirational-quotes, life, old-age, patience-and-love, the-good-old-days, things-of-old-times, understanding-life, wisdom-quotes

quote: Not until we leave bad situations for worst situations, we shall least value and appreciate bad situations which shield us from the worst situation
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: appreciate-what-you-have, bad-situations, criticism, had-i-know, love-quotes, patience, regrets, situations, time-changes, what-you-have-in-hand, wisdom-quotes, wise-sayings, worst-conditions, worst-situations-in-life

quote: Hard talk punch thought. Hard talk penetrate the heart. A hard talk opens jaws. Hard talk make us ponder to wonder. It is always hard to hear the hard talk that speaks the truth and reality but, such a hard talk is always a hard talk!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quotes, brainy-words, courage-to-speak, food-for-thought, hard-talk, life, mistakes-quotes, realities, realities-of-life, reasoning, the-truth, the-truth-will-set-you-free, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: A paradox of life; be it good or bad, joy or sorrow, comfort or discomfort, appointment or disappointment, encouragement or discouragement, deception or loyalty, faithfulness or unfaithfulness, a good day or a bad day, things in life never remains static. Things keep moving and things keep changing. Seconds keep galloping, minutes keep changing into hours and hours keep turning into days. Free your mind from such things which are capable of crippling it from thinking distinctively. Notwithstanding the situation, keep moving to the purposeful land.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-happy, brainy-quotes, change-quotes, change-your-life, change-your-thoughts, free-your-mind, inspirational-quotes, keep-moving-forward, let-go-of-the-past, let-go-quotes, moving-on-quotes, step-by-step, think-well, time, time-management, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: A great difference between May and Day is the M and D! Be a good Managing Director of your life each day in May.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: change-something, do-something-each-day, life, live-your-best-life, make-a-change, make-a-difference, may, may-quotes, the-month-of-may, time, wisdom-quotes

quote: The only difference between May and Day is the M and D! Be a good Managing Director of your life each day in May.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: change-something, do-something-each-day, life, live-your-best-life, make-a-change, make-a-difference, may, may-quotes, the-month-of-may, time, wisdom-quotes

quote: To be real is to be who you are according to the purpose which God wants you to accomplish but not to be who people want you to be according to what they think you should be.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-courageous, be-firm, be-real, being-yourself, confusion-and-attitude, do-what-you-have-to-do, inspirational-quotes, purpose-in-life, realities, realities-of-life, reason, stay-focused, taking-steps, what-people-say-or-think, what-people-think-of-you, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wsdom

quote: Today is another day! Yesterday is gone but not its memories. There were so many things we expected yesterday which did not happen and what we least expected happened instead. Some are still expecting something. Expectation is a pillar of life. We all do have our expectations for today. Though we may or we may not be able to tell with certainty how our expectations would materialize. We ought to take life easy. Well, it may not be so easy to take it easy but, take it easy! Stay focused and entrust your trust in God. After all what you least expects can happen; serendipity can visit you and stay with you forever at a twinkle of an eye. The coin of life can however turn within a moment of time and your expectations can become a big had I know and a night mare; the vicissitudes of life can rob you at any moment of time. No one knows what the next second really holds. What matters in life is to do what matter; plant the seed of life God has entrusted in your hands and dare to ensure its abundant fruitfulness. The very problem in life is living to neglect the very reasons why you are living because of the problems you may face in living why you must live. When you trade why you must live for why you must not live, you are ruled by what you know but you do not know how it is ruling you. Once we have life, let us live for life all about living and living life is life!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude, attitude-quotes, brainy-quotes, daring-quotes, expectations, failure-and-attitude, failure-quotes, fear, food-for-thought, had-i-know, inspirational-messages, life-issues, live-the-best-life, living-life, love, love-what-you-do, memories-quotes, regrets, serendipity, serendipity-quotes, stay-focused, success-quotes, take-it-easy, today-is-your-day, vicissitudes-of-life, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom, yesterday-quotes

author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: At the school of wisdom, mistake is not just a lesson but, a laboratory
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: laboratory, learning-from-mistakes-quote, life, life-lessons, mistakes, regrets, what-mistake-teaches, wisdom, wisdom-quotes

quote: Know who you are and be who you are insofar as it is deem fit, for there is nothing so contemptuous to be who you are!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-who-you-are, be-yourself, be-yourself-quote, inspirational-quotes, know-who-you-are, wisdom-quotes

quote: My hope is that tomorrow will be fine, but, if tomorrow doesn't go well, I shall still hope to be fine tomorrow!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-reason-to-live, desires-quotes, don-t-give-up-quotes, don-t-worry, don-t-worry-be-happy, eay-inspirations, eay-quotes, encouragement-quotes, faith, heart-break, hope, hopeful-people, hopeful-quotes, hopelessness, it-shall-be-well-tomorrow, life, love-quotes, painful-memories, reflections-on-life, tenacity-quotes, tomorrow-quotes, when-things-go-wrong, wisdom-quotes

quote: In reality, the world is not an arena of comfort but comfort that works! Comfort that makes impact! Yes, comfort that changes lives and leaves a distinctive footprint! Truly, comfort that does not work is only discomfort at work in silence. So many people shall dwell in comfort without working with it only to meet discomfort one day and remember comfort!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: comfort, comfort-zone, discomfort, don-t-settle-cheap, feeling-comfortable, generous-people, generousity, had-i-know, life-lessons, make-impact, relaxing-in-life, remember-to-be-kind, thinking-of-only-today, tomorrow, use-your-gift, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: Even at 80, I shall say that I am yet to start, for that shall give me the real reason never ever to look back and see what I have done but to look ahead and see the marvelous things I shall be able to do and the distinctive footprints I shall be able live and leave with the very seconds that shall be ahead of me! Life must never be over until all is over!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: do-it-at-any-age, do-something-great, don-t-give-up, don-t-just-live, eay, eay-inspirations, eay-quotes, every-seconds-count, everyday-life, inspirational-quotes, life-at-eighty, life-is-not-a-dream, live-life-quotes, live-life-so-well, moments, moments-of-life, tenacity-quotes, the-essence-of-life, the-essence-of-time, time-passing, until-i-die, until-it-is-all-over, wisdom-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: It takes true courage and real humility to say NO or YES!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: courage-quotes, courage-to-say-no, courage-to-say-yes, humility-quotes, inspirational-quotes, life-lessons-quotes, love-quotes, no, saying-no, saying-yes, understanding-life, wisdom-quotes, yes

quote: Do not just go through the day without pausing to ponder! You shall only retire wondering.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: life, life-lessons, life-style-choices, retirement-planning, the-summary-of-life, wisdom-quotes, working-life

quote: It is a new day for a new thought, new identity, new ideas, new steps and new breathe! We may choose to repeat the mistakes of yesterday or think of the lessons from the mistakes of yesterday. We may choose dwell on the fortunes or misfortunes of yesterday or think of what we can do with the fortunes or misfortunes of yesterday today! We may choose to continue or discontinue the steps we took yesterday today. Life is here today and we must think of what we can do today for today was the vision of yesterday and the true foundation of tomorrow!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-good-day, a-new-step, eay, eay-inspirations, eay-quotes, goodmorning-quotes, have-a-great-day, inspirational-quotes, lessons-from-mistakes, life, live-in-the-moment, live-life-well, mistakes-of-the-past, motivational, regrets, think-well, today, tomorrow-quotes, wisdom-quotes

quote: Do not live because of the fear of death. Live because of the fear of the death of the real reason why you live. Death is no respecter of persons. Death can come when we have not even given him our attention. Death doesn't mind that you are in tension and even when you in the mid of doing something at his arrival, you shall go with nothing. The most important thing to death is to take you at a sudden. Mind your time then! Mind your true purpose! And mind the real reasons why you wake up each day and retire when the sun sets! Life is once, live it well!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-good-manager, brains-words, death-of-a-loved-one, fear-of-daeth, inspirational-quotes, life-is-once, live-life-well, mind-your-mind, mind-your-time, philosophy-of-life, reflections, thinking-with-a-great-mind, thought, why-we-live, why-we-sleep, why-we-wake-up, wisdom-quotes, your-true-destiny, your-true-purpose-in-life

quote: Think of something, Oh yes! Think of something. Your life must not be in retardation so think of something! Think of growth for that is the whole essence of life!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: do-something, do-something-in-life, fulfilment, growth, life, live-life-so-well, purpose-driven-life, retarded-growth, the-essence-of-life, the-essence-of-time, think-of-something, wisdom-quotes

quote: I have two great duties in each day: firstly, to identify why I woke up and secondly to be convinced of why I must retire!

quote: Everybody can do something. Anyone can do anything, but, it takes an understanding of real freedom to know do’s and don’ts and the essence of do’s and don’ts’. Nobility knows rules, nobility understands rules, and nobility recognizes the real reasons for staying within the border lines of rules that uphold dignity as a sacred responsibility. Nobility least do things anyhow, anywhere and anytime.

quote: There is always a good choice and there is always a better choice. There is always the best choice and there is always a choice to choose. quote: Critics are important. They give us the reasons, knowingly or unknowingly, not to fall, slumber or deviate from our true purpose . If only you would see, understand and appreciate the real lessons your critics teach you with a calm heart, you would know and understand that your critics are nothing but great facilitators to help you get to your vision and true purpose diligently and distinctively.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: when you see the problem as a more of you and less of people, you will find a distinctive solution to the recurring hurdles. Attitudinal and mindset change can cause a great change
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Your mockers will only have your attention only if you give them your attention

author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Out of frustrations, out of desperation, out of disappointments, out of mediocrity. out of idleness,out of limited insight, out of difficulties, out of insatiability, out of poverty, out of pain and the vicissitudes of life , so many people shall come to a conclusion that nothing is worth living for; not even what is solemn and sacred but, some shall always turn the woes of life into great land marks and indelible footprints worth emulating
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quotes, brainy-words, broken-heart, broken-hearted-quotes, champions-of-life, counselling-help, difficult-times-quotes, difficulties-of-life, don-t-give-up, food-for-thought, footprints-lessons, inspirational-quotes, living-great, never-ever-quit, out-of-desperations, out-of-pain, out-of-poverty, psyche, suicidal-thoughts, suicide, suicide-attempt, time-changes, turning-the-sad-story-of-life, vicissitudes-of-life, why-some-give-up, winners, wisdom-quotes

quote: The earth is an arena of champions. We are all champions. We all did overcome millions of potential human beings’ before making it unto the earth. Our spectators watching our race of life are the Seen and the Unseen. Thought, attitude and choice are what bring the differences in the arena of mother earth. The real champions in this life are they that will run the race of life facing the storms, overcoming the hurdles, unraveling the puzzles of life, questioning the status quo in wit, over ruling environmental mediocrity and daring for great and indelible change out of comfort or discomfort.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: arena-of-life, attitude-quotes, challenging-to-change, champions-of-life, comfort, daring-to-make-impact, discomfort, discomfort-zone, how-to-be-a-champion, in-this-life, inspirational-quotes, living-life-to-the-fullest, living-well, mediocrity-and-happiness, the-race-of-life, the-seen, unseen, winning-life, wisdom-quotes, wit

quote: You seem irrelevant because your relevance seems latent. You seem irrelevant because your relevance is not speaking the language they understand. You seem irrelevant because you have not yet proven the evidence that is relevant. You seem irrelevant because you are still holding your relevance. People are more interested in works that work than mere works. People are much more interested in the relevance of actions than mere actions. People are more interested in your whole self in action and the relevance of the action than your mere action. There is something to be done. There is a footprint to leave. We must do something relevant. A proven relevance is relevant for our relevance in all matters of life.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: branding, branding-quotes, doing-your-best, feeling-relevant, inspirational-quotes, latent-action, life-and-living, life-lessons, matters-of-life, matters-of-the-heart, procrastination, purpose-driven-life, relevance, relevance-of-principles, staying-focused, staying-positive, understanding-yourself, wisdom-quotes

quote: A good conscience is an epitome of good life and a true standard of living
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-good-conscience, a-true-standard-of-living, conscience, conscience-and-attitude, integrity, living-freely, living-well-quotes, sin, sincerity, staying-blameless, wisdom-quotes

quote: life is full of fantasies. Life is full of realities. Fantasies bring fantasies and realities bring realities. You have a choice. Yes, an inevasible choice. To live in the world of fantasies or to live in the world of realities; your choice!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: aspirations-quotes, attitude, attitude-quotes, brainy-quotes, caution-and-attitude, deceptions, facing-the-facts, facing-the-truth, fantasies, inspirational-quotes, realities, realities-of-life, staying-assertive, vigilance, vision-and-ambition, wisdom-quotes, world-of-fantasies

quote: The world of reality exists. The world of fantasy exists. The great boundary between the world of reality and the world of fantasy is the boundary of pleasure and fallacy. So many people enter into the world of realities through the the gate of betrayal and pain of the world of fantasies. If you live in the world of fantasies, ponder!If you live in the world of realities, learn and use your lessons.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: avoiding-pain, betrayal-of-love-and-dreams, desire-and-attitude, desires, desires-quotes, dreams-and-reality, facing-realities, facing-the-truth, ignorance, living-well, living-well-quotes, philosophy-of-life, realities-of-life, thinking-twice, wisdom-quotes

quote: we are bound to make mistakes. We are bound to meet mistakes. We have regretted certain decisions we took yesterday today and we may regret some decisions of today tomorrow but not until we regret the regrets, we shall always have the regrets
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: common-mistakes, common-sense, decision-quotes, focus-on-your-dreams, living-well, mistakes-learn-life, mistakes-we-make, misunderstanding, pain-of-regrets, recurring-problems, regret-free-life, regrets, sorrowful-quotes, staying-focused, tomorrow, wisdom-quotes, wit

quote: Comfort blindfolds; difficulty brings realization.Pain reveals; disappointments plant trigger of actions.Fear controls; ignorance deceives.Anger torments; silence keeps.Misunderstanding divides; love joins.Laughter starts; deception suspects.Frowning cautions; sorrow remembers.Purposefulness moves; idleness wastes.When you live in comfort, ponder.When you live in pain, take lessons.When life goes up, plant your feet and appreciate the height.When life goes down, envision the height and dare to get there with tenacity. Life is how you take and manage things. Be a manager of things or things shall be your manager
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: actions, actions-speak-louder-than-words, anger-management, comfort, deceptions, disappointments-pain, doing-great-things, fear, ignorance, life-and-living, life-lessons, love-quotes, manager-of-life, misunderstanding, notable-quotes, perseverance, perseverance-quotes, ponder, purposefulness, staying-at-the-top, tenacity, wisdom-quotes

quote: I have a dream, I have a vision, I have a mission, I have to do something, I will do this at this time; the thoughts of everybody; how do I deal with that obstacle? how do I get there? ; troubling questions for everybody! Releasing ourselves, plugging into the purpose, challenging the challenges, questioning the unquestionable, taking the chances; the asset and audacity of somebody. Everybody has a dream but, it is somebody who gets to the dream.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accomplishing-the-mission, advice-for-daily-living, audacity, brainy-quotes, doing-something-with-your-life, everybody, facing-challenges, facing-realities, getting-to-the-dream, getting-to-the-point, how-to-get-to-the-dream, i-have-a-dream, inspirational-quotes, living-the-dream, somebody, tenacity, why-some-fail-in-life, wisdom-quotes, zeal

quote: Free your mind. Disentangle your mindset from what can set your mind from your true purpose. Dare when you have to. Enjoy when it is a must. Relax when there is the need to, but, don’t spend the time. Don’t let wealth be a hindrance to fulfilling your true you. Don’t let poverty captivate your true you. Don’t let the environment engulf your true purpose; if possible flee to be free to dare. We all have excuses. Yourself is the most important factor in fulfilling your true you. Free your mind!!!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: challenging-status-quo, challenging-the-challenges, daring, excuses, focus, free-your-mind, free-your-mind-from-the-past, fulfilling-your-true-you, getting-to-the-goal, hindrances-to-life, inspirational-quotes, inspirations, lessons-of-life, mindset, moving-on, poverty, poverty-and-purpose, psyche, reasoning-to-win, relaxing-the-mind, tenacity, wealth-and-purpose, winners-thought, wisdom-quotes

quote: challenges are everywhere. Awake! challenge and defeat the challenges that challenge you in a challenging way and be not be defeated by the challenges that challenge you in a challenging way
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: notable people do notable things for they take notice of the unnoticed.They think beyond our thinking. They look beyond what we all look. They try, fail, and try again.They dare unrelentingly. They don't die with their purpose. They die on their purpose. Though they die, their purpose ever lives.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quote, die-on-purpose, footprints, footprints-in-life, living-to-live, look-beyond-what-you-look, notable-people, notable-quotes, psyche, the-best-quotes, unnoticed, unnoticed-things, wisdom-quotes

quote: Have patience or be a patient. Have patience in preparatory moments or be a patient after preparatory moments
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: have patience or be a patient. Have patience in preparation moments or be a patient after preparation moments

quote: Everyone has something to think about everyday, but it is not everyone who thinks about something everyday. And that is the difference
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quote, brainyquote, differences, everyone, psyche, purpose, purpose-driven-life, reasons, reasons-to-live, reasons-why, wisdom-quotes

quote: What you have in hand may be of less essence to knowing and using what you have in hand
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: ignorance, knowledge, life-and-living, life-lessons, psyche, the-arduous-errand, wisdom-quotes

quote: Thought is uncontrollable but controllable. Thought is the pivot of life and the epitome of good or bad living. A controlled thought is a controlled life and an uncontrolled life is an uncontrolled living. Our first and last thoughts from dawn to dusk are of great essence to living a purposeful life. They form a catalyst for a progressive or retrogressive life. What do you think of most before you sleep? What do you ponder upon most upon waking up from bed? The distinctive boundaries to your purposeful day are your first and last thoughts of the day. Remember! the first and the last thoughts.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-bad-day, advice-for-daily-living, confidence, controlled-life, dawn, dusk, footprints, great-thoughts, happy-day, life, living-purposefully, psyche, wisdom-quotes

quote: when words make noise, silence can talk.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: When people give you disappointment, don't worry; they are only showing you this- appointment. Just look and see.

quote: When you are on a great mission, look simple;think and act complexly
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Do not worry when situations get bitter. A bitter situation is a better teacher. The greatest lessons in life can least be found in comfort and much more in uncomfortable situations of life.

quote: he death of a purposeful person is not the death of purpose

quote: you are trained for job but you are born to work.Exert then your energy in the right proportion on the most vital matters
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: carrer, carrer-choices, ignorance, job-search, proportionality, wisdom-quotes, work

quote: The entire universe has been harmoniously created and everything in it work in harmony.The sun has its rising and settling time. Seasonal changes have their own time for appearing and departing.Fruit bearing trees have their own time and timing. The child crawls and then walks.We take a step to make a journey. A simple deviation then from the normal is a simple deviation to the abnormal.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: deviations, diligence, fruits, harmony, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, normal-life, purpose-of-life, time, time-management, universe, wisdom-quotes

quote: wisdom is great, but sometimes, those who think they are wiser than others can become the otherwise

quote: A time past is an essence gone
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: when you do more than you learn, you leave a distinctive notable footprint on earth

quote: the greatest clue to changing people is to know and understand what trigger change in people and effectively apply such things in wisdom.

category: brainy-quote, brainyquote, brainyquote-com, change, people-inspire-people, people-relations, understanding-life, understanding-oneself-and-others, wisdom-quotes

quote: do not only describe your situation, that event, that person, place or that thing. By describing, we limit our thoughts in pondering. We ought to prescribe. The sick describes his illness to the doctor and the doctor prescribes an antidote. We all do have stories to tell in life, we all do face challenges each day, and likewise we experience joyous moments; that is life. To espouse an unpopular cause, prescribe a great antidotes to every life occurrence from daybreak to sunset. Remember prefer prescribe to describe!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude, brainy-quote, inspirational-quotes, life, wisdom-quotes

quote: the source of a river is narrow. If you could jump over it in a twinkle of an eye at the source, be sure to ponder before you jump over it at its mid or its estuary.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: growth, inspirational-quotes, life, life-lessons, wisdom-quotes

quote: There exist no purposeful life without the ''sanballat's and the ''Tobiah's''The oppositions in life. they will give you all the necessary reasons why you will fail. Kites do rise by oppositions.Oppositions in life are therefore a necessity for growth. Your oppositions in life will position or disposition you depending on how you position your oppositions.courage, wisdom and God will see you to the top. Beware of tongues of mediocrity as it can be a detriment to your mind and purpose.We were born to be fruitful and multiply.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: inspirational-quotes, life, problems, progress, wisdom-quotes

quote: failure and obstacles are not the ultimate cause that deteriorate purpose but attitude and the mind

quote: When you confidently defend fiction, think about reality also
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Language is life and a true backbone of any society!

quote: he who speaks parables knows and understands the real meaning of parables better
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: can I ask you a simple but complex question? Why are you still alive and living?

quote: two great questions exist in each day; 'what must I do excellently today?' for morning and 'what did I do wrong or right today?' for evening. When we fail to know the real reasons why we wake up each day and why we retire at night, we fail to know the real reasons why we live.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bed-time-quote, each-day, living-great, living-well-in-the-day, making-good-use-of-the-day, morning-quote, morning-thoughts, ponder-over-the-day, psychology, purposeful-living, reasons-to-live, understanding-life, why-we-wake-up

quote: each day's life comes with lot of puzzles, mysteries to unravel; being so conscious of life can make one so unconscious of life
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: awareness-and-attitude, life, life-lessons, mysteries-of-life, psychology, puzzles-of-life

quote: Mind your strength! Let people know that you are strong and let them see how strong you are, and who or what makes you strong, but in doing so, be careful showing people the true source of your strength for not all people deserve to know that! You may never know what is behind the mind! Sometimes in life, the day you show people how wise you are, the very day you show them how unwise you are! Get understanding and walk in wisdom!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: know-what-to-do, silence, strength, strength-and-courage, strength-and-weakness, strength-of-will, think-before-you-act, think-before-you-speak, wisdom, wise-words, words-of-wisdom

quote: He who don't understand the real essence of critics and oppositions in the journey of life criticizes and opposes himself, knowingly or unknowingly, in his journey of life.

category: blame-game, criticism, failure-and-attitude, failure-and-success, oppositions-in-life, self-awareness, self-improvement, self-motivation

quote: Comfort has been the very reason why so many people never lived their real and true destiny though they got to a certain comfortable destination!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: comfort, destiny, destiny-and-attitude, purpose-in-life, purposeful-living

quote: Clay in the hands of a good potter suffers so many good turns, but in the end, we see its real and true shape and form!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: challenges, destiny, difficulties-of-life, the-journey-of-life, the-journey-to-success, trust-in-god, ups-and-downs

quote: There is this one thing that makes a big difference: creativity! There is this one thing that gives birth to great things: imaginations! The world we see is a product of creativity and imaginations, and they that know the power of creativity and how to give life to their imaginations live and leave distinctive footprints!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: branding-quotes, creativity, imaginations, standing-out

quote: Anybody can choose to relax but somebody must choose to pursue
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: achievement-and-attitude, giving-up, pursue, relaxed, success-quotes, vision

quote: If you have not seen the real end of the journey, don’t boast much at the beginning and never be too proud and haughty in mid of the path. Keep the real end in mind and mind how to get to the real end successfully!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: All that the spider needs to complete its web is step taking
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: building-your-dream, double-mindedness, move, possibilities-quotes, start-something, success-quotes, take-a-step, the-journey-of-life, the-journey-to-success, the-value-in-you, you-can-do-it

quote: If you cannot score just a point each day, you shall score zero points at the end of your days

quote: When you patiently examine the beautiful skin of the leopard after it’s hard day's search for the meat it enjoys, you shall not only see the sweat that went into its search for the meat, but you shall also realize the scent of the sweat beneath the beautiful skin.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quotes, comfort, food-for-thought, hard-times, hard-work, hardship, leopard, life-lessons, painful-memories, rich-men, sowing-the-seeds-of-greatness, sowing-time, success-quotes, successful-living, successful-people, tenacity, toil, wise-sayings, words-of-wisdom

quote: One great enemy we must all endeavor to fear not conquering is fear. Fear can cripple purpose and purposeful life. Fear asks question we must fear. Fear makes vision a nightmare. One must always cross the barrier of fear to get to the great city of true purposefulness. A great number of us who are unable to live to accomplish the true reason for our existence on earth are unable to cross the barrier of fear in the first place.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accomplishing-the-mission, asking-so-many-questions, conquer-fear, dare-to-do, dare-to-dream, dare-to-win, excuses, failure-quotes, fear, fear-of-death, fear-of-failure, fear-of-unknown, fearless-quotes, life, life-and-living, life-experience, life-lessons, success-quotes

quote: Failure exists. Yes! Failure exists. Don’t expect to meet all your expectations in life; however, expect to do everything you must do to realize your expectations and success. These two things success and failure have in common; they both responds to uncertainty and they are triggered by action.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: expectations, failure-and-attitude, failure-and-success, failure-quotes, life-issues, preparation-to-face-the-day, preparedness, success-quotes, tenacity, uncertainty, uncertainty-in-life, uncertainty-principle, uncertainty-quotes, when-failure-comes

quote: He who doesn’t believe that God can do everything believes in a god who can do something! He who knows that God is all does all things because of God, no matter what!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: belief, believe-in-god, faith-quotes, trust-in-god

quote: It takes a little slip to slip. Inappropriate words are inappropriate!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bad-words, humility-in-greatness, mind-your-words, slip-of-tongue, words

quote: Before you speak it, know it! Before you act it, understand it. And when your words and actions go wrong, humbly learn to accept your slips for a progressive change. Learning never ends!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accept-mistakes, anger-and-attitude, words, wrong-actions

quote: Everybody is a writer. Everybody has a hand. Everybody has a story. Everybody writes stories of life from dawn to dusk. Everybody has a pen. Everybody has inks. These are the inks for writing the stories of life: words, thoughts, actions and deeds! The pen is important, but the ink in the pen determines the color of the writing! The pen is important, but the hand that holds the pen determines the style of the writing! Whether we choose our words well or not; whether we choose to think well or not; whether we choose our actions well or not; whether we choose to do good or not, we write a story of life, and we remain accountable to God in the end!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: actions, choices, deeds, life-and-living, stories-of-life, thoughts, words

quote: Maturity: control your emotions! Maturity: get understanding! Maturity: learn from daily experiences! Maturity: practice what you learn distinctively! Maturity: know when to do what! Maturity: understand silence, actions and words and use them well and appropriately! Maturity: don’t just say anything, don’t just do anything, don’t just act anything, don’t just throw anything and don’t just show anything at all, not even at the most compelling moment, unless you are fully ready to be responsible, without any speck of regret, for the consequences of anything done out of immaturity! Let us get matured whilst we grow and let us grow in maturity
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: actions, grow-up, immaturity, maturity, words

quote: We fail to say the right words, because we choose to say the wrong words! We choose to say the wrong words, because we fail to think about the right words!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: choices, right-words, think-before-you-act, think-before-you-speak, thought, words, wrong-choices, wrong-words

quote: We fail to say the right words, because we choose to say the wrong words! We choose to say the wrong words, because we fail to think of the right words!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: choices, right-words, think-before-you-act, think-before-you-speak, thought, words, wrong-choices, wrong-words

quote: doubters only doubt what they doubt
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action-quotes, doubt-quotes, sceptics, words

quote: It takes just a step to show the other side of you that you never wanted to show. It takes just a word to start the words you never wanted to say. It all begins with something and it all starts somewhere. Mind the starting point and note the beginning.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action, attitude-quotes, be-careful, had-i-known, know-yourself-better, lessons-of-life, mind-your-steps, mistakes-quotes, regrets, speaking-your-mind, thought, words

quote: Stay calm and exercise restrain during your most desperate moment or you shall desperately say what when your desperation is over, you shall come to a later realization of what you shouldn’t have say and notice how silence could have been the best option to mere words!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: betrayal, caution-in-what-you-say, despair, desperation, emotions, food-for-thought, love, moments, regrets, temper, temptations, thoughts, trauma, understanding-oneself-and-others, words

quote: The road that connects our thoughts to the ears of others is our tongue. What travel on this road is our word. Our action is the energy which transmits our emotions to the eyes of others and causes a great change in their minds
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action, actions, emotions-and-attitude, love-quotes, mind-your-words, philosophy, science, signs, speech, thought, what-goes-into-our-mind, why-we-do-what-we-do, words

quote: When you understand silence, you understand words; when you understand words, you understand silence. When you think of silence, you think of words. Until you mistakenly utter bad words, you shall never appreciate the real essence of silence that can speak better at the most tempting moment. Until you miss the opportunity when you should have spoken whilst you kept silent, you shall never value the real value and the timing of words. A good orator knows the right time and timing to blend words and silence in oration. A good orator is good because of words and silence.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: life, oration, regretful-words, silence, temptations, time-and-timing, timing-is-everything, words, words-spoken

quote: why talk and say the unsaid words in haste when silence can speak the unspoken words?
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude, emotional-pain, emotions-and-attitude, emotions-quotes, feelings, haste, silence, speaking-your-mind, think-before-you-act, think-before-you-speak, unspoken-words, words

quote: I choose to choose few words each day. Yes! few words that count. Few words that can make impact. Few words that talk much. Few words that can make people ponder to wonder. Few words that are indelible. Few words that can leave distinctive footprints on minds. Though we may fail to mind our words, we shall never fail to mind the works of our words.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: choices-and-attitude, choices-and-consequences, choose-few-words, choose-the-right-words, lessons-of-life, love-quotes, talking-too-much, the-works-of-words, think-before-you-act, think-before-you-speak, words, words-and-actions, words-have-power, words-of-wisdom

quote: The more deeper you think, the more silent you become. You understand the reasons behind the reason. It may not necessarily mean you are short of words. You however know what ignorance can trigger and how to deal with ignorance and purpose. The timeliness of your word is surely on point.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: actions-over-words, actions-speak-louder-than-words, ignorance, living-freely, patience, reasons-for-action, responding-to-people, silence, silence-quote, thinking-deep, thought, timeliness, timing-is-everything, triggers-of-action, understanding-human-behavior, words, words-of-wisdom

quote: The more deeper you think, the more silence you become. You understand the reasons behind the reason. It may not necessarily mean you are short of words. You however know what ignorance can trigger and how to deal with ignorance and purpose. The timeliness of your word is surely on point
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: actions-over-words, actions-speak-louder-than-words, ignorance, living-freely, patience, reasons-for-action, responding-to-people, silence, silence-quote, thinking-deep, thought, timeliness, timing-is-everything, triggers-of-action, understanding-human-behavior, words, words-of-wisdom

quote: silence can be words but words cannot be silence
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: life-quotes, purpose, silence, words

quote: A tin of milk is not the same as a milk tin. You are not always the same as others perceive you. The label of a tin of milk is not all that important as compared to the milk in the tin. So many people label others as if the ‘true milk’ in them is equal to the label. We must not always equate the outward man to the inner man. Guard your milk! The only way people can destroy your milk is their ability to punch a hole in ‘the tin’ and after they have done that, they can have reasons to speak about how ‘expired your milk is’. Dare to preserve your milk, no matter how people label you! Keep doing what you need to do as a living sacrifice to the Sovereign Lord God, and one day, they that label you wrongly shall come to a realization how they have their own labels. Stay focused! Move with the right reasons!Two people were asked to go and pick a tin of milk without first touching it. The first tin was well labeled, but without any liquid in it. The second was without a label, but with milk in it. When the two men got to where the tins were, one was quick to pick the one with the label, leaving the other for his friend. Then they came to him who sent them and he asked them, ‘I asked you to go for a tin of milk, where is it?’ the one who took the tin without the milk was quick to stretch his hand, but their sender said to him, ‘a tin of milk is not just a tin labeled a tin of milk, but a tin with milk’.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: blackmailers, depression, how-others-see-you, judging-by-appearance, opinion-of-others, slandering

quote: There are so many people whose minds do not belong to them. There are so many people whose thoughts have been purchased by people. There are so many people who have made people kings and queens of their thought. There are so many people who cannot sleep because of people. There are so many people whose lives are a small percentage of their own self and a greater percentage of others. When the offenses of people occupy your mind, your mind becomes the offenses of people instead of your own mind. To have your own mind and to be your own self, free your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude, attitude-quotes, be-yourself-quotes, bitterness-quotes, depression, food-for-thought, free-your-mind, free-your-mind-from-the-past, free-yourself, grudges, grudges-against-people, grudges-in-your-heart, hatred, inspirational-quotes, life, mistakes-quotes, offenses, ponder, think-positively, thinking-quotes, thought

quote: A Christian who understands the power of prayer, and lives a just life has power because of prayer and righteousness.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: prayer, righteousness

Oh precious Lord!Thou know them allOh precious Lord!Oh precious Lord!Thou know them allDarkness I seeThe joy I want but I can't seeThou know them allOh precious Lord! Oh precious LordThou know them allOh precious Lord!Oh precious Lord!Thou know them allDesires that blindfoldThe end untoldThou know them allOh precious Lord! Oh precious Lord!Thou know them all

quote: so many people believe but few people receive
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The end is the matter! A step to the end is a factor!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: decesion-quote, footprints, life, life-and-living, taking-steps, the-end-is-the-matter, words-of-wisdom

quote: Strive through your adversities like a great football striker. Concentrate on the goal post and your ability to score a great goal. Let your attention be on your strength and your distinctive dexterity that can beat the strength and oppositions of your defenders and not the height, strength or boldness of the defenders.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action, attitude, be-bold, lessons-from-football, life-and-living, opposition-quotes, purpose, vision

quote: Some teachers only teach us and go but some teachers teach us and they leave indelible footprints which continue to teach us forever! Great teachers live and leave distinctive footprints. Great teachers, though they go, their footprints forever live in our minds and inspire the body and the soul in a distinctive way !
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: best-teacher, discipleship, great-teachers, great-thinkers, life-and-living, my-teacher, philosophers, philosphy, teaching-quotes, thinkers, thinkers-of-our-time, thought

quote: There are problems and there are problems. One big problem and a great paradox in the arena of life is the problem of where or how a person is now and where or how he wants to be tomorrow. Had it not been this problem, we would have been relaxing all day long
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anxiety-quotes, aspirations-quotes, daily-living, daily-quotes, inspirational-quotes, keep-calm, life-and-living, life-problems, vision, why-we-live, work-hard-quotes, worry, worry-quotes

quote: We must not just be recipients but givers! We must not just be keepers but donors! Giving brings relief and sharing enlightens the heart. Caring joins and showing love is life. It is never enough to acquire all acquisition. It is never enough to have all our ambitions. We must endeavor to give for giving out of a true heart is a true love and a true love is life.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-cheerful-giver, a-cheerful-heart, be-the-joy-of-others, caring-for-others, caring-quotes, give, give-from-a-good-heart, help-an-orphan, help-someone-in-need, life-and-living, love-quotes, orphanage, real-love, real-love-quotes, true-giving

quote: What goes into our mind matters a lot to the success or failure of our lives. For so many people, what they heard triggered their steps that led them into discarding the real value of their lives. For so many people, what they heard became a spring board that shot the real value of their lives to a glorious height and for so many people, what they heard made them to choose never to do anything in life. Until you lose your hearing, you shall always hear. But, what you hear and what you deduce from what you hear must not just be distinctive but sound enough to make you take a distinctive step which will produce a distinctive footprint. If you fail to mind the seed of what goes into your mind today, you shall surely mind the fruits of what went into your mind yesterday tomorrow. Mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action-quotes, behavioral-psychology, life, life-and-living, life-lessons, listening-and-hearing, listening-quotes, mind-your-life, mind-your-mind, ponder, thought, tomorrow-quotes, what-goes-into-our-mind, words-of-inspiration, words-of-wisdom

quote: The ultimate way to change something is to change what is behind that something. Change what is behind something and something will change!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, attitude-toward-life, change-something, change-your-attitude, food-for-thought, life-and-living, mindset-quotes, thought, wise-words, work

quote: The more you live, the more today you see, the more yesterday’s you left and the more tomorrow you say! Only those who have lived long can best tell the regrets of yesterday, the lessons in today and the real reasons to ponder before you say and think of tomorrow!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-good-life, experience-in-life, footprints, inspirational-words, life-and-living, life-lessons, long-life, old-age-quotes, regrets-in-life, regrets-of-yesterday, thought, tomorrow-quotes, wisdom-of-old-age, words-of-wisdom, youth

quote: Insofar as there shall always be a desire, there shall always be a want and there shall always be a need
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: desires-quotes, hope, life-and-living, needs-and-wants, reasons-why, wants

quote: If only you can add just one great and distinctive thing to your life each day, you shall surely not just live and leave one great thing!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: distinctive-footprints, do-something-today, don-t-just-leave-but-live, footprints-of-life, idleness-quote, inspirational-quotes, life-and-living, life-lessons, live-life-so-well, tenacity-quotes, think-grealty, you-can-do-it

quote: When the situation demands action, know the end of the action before you start the action
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, emotions, emotions-and-attitude, heart-issues, life-and-living, love-quotes, regrets, responsibility, result-of-action, taking-action, taking-chances, taking-risk, thought

quote: Only those with tenacity can march forward in March
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accomplish-the-task, agility, do-the-undone, forward-movement, life, life-and-living, march, march-quotes, month-of-march, moving-forward, moving-on, tenacity, thought

quote: The world is an arena where things represents things. It is a stage where the same thing is seen from different lenses as a different thing.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: competition-and-attitude, competition-quotes, competitor, conflict, conflict-resolution, different-understanding, different-viewpoints, doing-the-same-thing-differently, life-and-living, life-lessons, misunderstandings, perspective-on-life, perspectives, thinking-differently

quote: Think of a new day and think of a new purpose. Think of a new reason out of the reasons of yesterday. Think of the distinctive step that is worth taking to continue the footprints of yesterday. Each day comes with its own ideas. Each day comes with its own troubles. Each day comes with its own possibles and impossibles. What makes each day good or bad is not just our thoughts but, the steps we take which is influenced by our thoughts to obtain what is good or bad. Think of a new day; think of a distinctive footprint
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-brand-new-day, a-new-day, a-new-day-is-here, distinctive-footprints, each-day-is-full-of-opporrunites, each-day-quotes, facing-the-challenges, good-thoughts, life, life-and-living, new-steps, new-thought, possibles-and-impossibles, purpose-driven-life, pursue-your-passion, solving-problems, start-anew, starting-over, thinking-great, thought

quote: There is no great path to greatness than true service. He who knows how to serve from a true heart and spirit knows what it takes to be truly great
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: greatness, greatness-quotes, humility, humility-in-greatness, humility-quotes, life, life-and-living, life-lessons, pursuit-of-happiness, serving-in-spirit, serving-others, thinking-greatly, thought, true-greatness, true-service

quote: Sometimes, until you do what you shouldn't have done, you least remember what you should have done
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: appreciating-mistakes, decision-quotes, doing-right-things-wrongly, doing-the-wrong-things, life, life-and-living, mistakes-quotes, practice-makes-perfect, wrong-choices

quote: all may not be well but, sometimes, things that seem so uncanny are what shield and protect us from the worst situations in life.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bad-situations, life-and-living, life-issues, life-problems, overcoming-challenges, resons-why-things-occur, tough-times, uncanny-situations-in-life, when-things-fall-apart, when-things-go-wrong, why-problems-come, worst-situations-in-life
