quote: loneliness is a great teacher and a master test of character
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: absence, absence-and-attitude, character-building, cheating-spouse, hurts, life-and-living, loneliness, loneliness-quotes, love, love-quotes-and-sayings, teacher-quotes

quote: so many people concentrate on looks, but the invisible is sacred
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: concentration, concern, concern-for-others, invisible, life, life-and-living, life-lessons, looks, looks-can-be-decieving, psyche, sacred

quote: A book may be regarded as irrelevant until it's relevance, importance and purpose is discovered through reading
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: life-and-living, reading, reading-books

quote: Keep learning! Learning means growing. He who always learns knows how to grow in maturity. When we stop learning, we stop growing our true purpose, and we stop growing in maturity. When we stop learning, we stop giving life to our true purpose! When we stop learning, we start decaying our true reason on earth! It takes true humility to learn. Learn from that child. Learn from the beautiful creations of God. Learn from failure. Learn from success. Learn from slothfulness. Learn from comfort. Learn from discomfort. Learn from the word of God! Learn for growth. Not all learning are good for growing. Not all learning promotes true purposefulness! Learn for change. Don’t ever stop learning, for the journey of life is full of lessons! Don’t ever neglect the lessons of life, or you shall always be learning the same lessons each moment of time. There is always something good to learn for change and growth from all circumstances we meet in life each day! Keep learning!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: learning, lessons-of-life, the-journey-of-life

quote: Don’t be too quick to leave the tree you are highly convinced of its future sweet fruits and comforting shade just because you see its present fruitlessness. Just sit under it and endure the scorching sun, one day, its branches will give you comfort and its fruits will give you smiles and nourish your body!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: impatience, learning, learning-from-mistakes, patience, understanding, vision

quote: so many people who think they know only know what they don't know, as time passes by, they may get to know what they don't know and then they will know
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: education-understanding-life, ignorance, knowing-what-you-know, learning, learning-process, life-lessons, patience, pride, time-tells, understanding-life

quote: When God was creating heaven and earth, and there came what seemed like a problem: darkness and formlessness, He did not talk problem, instead, He spoke solution: ‘And God said, "Let there be light," and there was light’. May we instead of making problems our speech, think and speak solutions!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: challenges-and-obstacles, creation, darkness, light, positive-speech, speak-well, think-well, when-you-meet-problems

quote: Faith is the blind heart that sees better than an opened eye
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: calmness, faith, patience, thought, trust

quote: Though sincerity is a word which rings its meaning in the mind when it is mentioned, its real meaning in real sense is neither the meaning we imagine nor the spoken word but in action. Yes, it is action that determines what sincere means in reality. Real action that stands the test of time does not only give a true meaning to the word sincere in our mind and mind’s eye but it also creates a real picture of who a real sincere person is in our minds and mind’s eye.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: heart-issues, real-life, realities-of-life, relationships, sincerity-quotes, trust

quote: Sometimes in life, we may have to experience solitude, the baseless accusations of people, the betrayal and misunderstanding of trusted and loyal ones, the great judgments and suggestions of ‘they that know better’, and a moment of a state of double mindedness. But those are also for good, for they are the very things that shape and prepare our mind, body and spirit to face the world and to accomplish our mission with great zeal, tenacity and distinctiveness.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accomplish-great-things, accusations, disloyalty, double-minded, facing-difficulties, misunderstandings, solitude, things-that-matter-in-life, things-that-shape-us, trust, trustworthiness, zeal

quote: say what the masses want just to win the masses and never do what the masses want and you will loose the masses
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: building-affection, elections, love, political-talks, politics, the-people, trust, wining-and-maintaining

quote: Forgiveness is freedom. Forgiveness is liberation. Forgiveness is a choice. If you forgive and forget you are free but, if you keep it, you shall always have it and it shall always rule and direct your heart, mind, body and spirit.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bitterness, forgiveness, forgiveness-is-a-choice, forgiveness-is-freedom, forgiveness-quotes, life, love-quotes, moving-on, moving-on-and-letting-go, offense, the-past-cannot-be-altered, the-past-is-gone-forver

quote: The real beauty of life is in orderliness.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: beauty-in-nature, beauty-of-life, beauty-quotes, laws, laws-of-nature, life-philosophy, life-quotes-and-sayings, orderliness, orderliness-of-life, peace-of-mind, peace-on-earth, reasoning, rules

quote: One thing hatred can do very well is to attack what it hates!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anger-quotes, attitude-quotes, hatred-quotes, know-your-enemy, life-lessons, life-philosophy, revenge, take-precautions

quote: If you meet the darkest moment of life, strive valiantly through it with courage and never retreat, for you shall surely meet light afterwards. If you meet the muddy stream of life, swim across it with tenacity to the very end for there is a clearer stream that shall wash your dirt away afterwards. If all people reject you in the mid of the arduous race of life, dare to smile and move on for there are people who await you to embrace you in the end
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accomplish-the-impossible, born-to-win, challenge-challenges, courage-quotes, courage-to-be-oneself, dare-to-do, depression-quotes, difficult-times-quotes, difficulties-of-life, don-t-accept-defeat, embrace-who-you-are, experiencing-rejection, fear, life-challenges, life-philosophy, life-problems, storms-of-life-quotes, tenacity, the-arduous-race-of-life, the-rejected

quote: Thought, if I may put it, is the man behind the pursuits, appearance, things we like, things we hate and the very epitome of our living. When you cripple the mind, you cripple the body, you cripple purpose and you cripple life
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-crippled-life, appearance, life, life-lessons, life-philosophy, living-well, overcoming-challenges-quotes, problems-quotes, pursuits, pursuits-of-happiness, sharttered-life, things-we-hate, things-we-love, thought, vision, why-we-do-what-we-do

quote: The greatest thinker we can ever think of is Jesus Christ. He knew how to make His contenders ponder in awe
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: great-thinkers, life-lessons, life-philosophy, oppositions-of-jesus-christ, the-greatest-thinker, thinkers

quote: do something whilst others think you cannot do anything
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anything, life, life-philosophy, living-life-to-the-fullest, living-the-dream, living-your-best-life, overcoming-frustrations, psyche, self-dignity, something, wisdom

quote: the prudent business mind must not only think of competing with the prevailing giants in the market but must also not be oblivious of the latent deft of the masses who are yet to dare
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: business, business-culture, business-quotes, competition, competition-and-attitude, deft, marketing, marketing-advice, marketing-quotes

quote: Imagine a world without words! Imagine a world without thoughts! Imagine a world without actions! If one day, God should mute all words, thoughts and actions, the world will look so different! If we are privileged to have them, let us try as possible as we can to use them well, for life will be something without words, thought and actions!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: food-for-thought, good-and-bad-actions, slander

quote: If people will be frank enough to tell you their heart issues, you will realize that there are so many things that will leave your jaws open! You will realize that things are just representing things under the sun. You will understand the realities and fantasies better and you will know how to deal with heart issues! You will know what true love is and you will get a better picture of pretense! You will understand the small things that mean a lot to so many people and you shall know the big things that mean nothing to so many people! You will know why people can’t sleep and you will know why so many people sleep soundly! You will understand the real reasons behind the attitude and behavior of people and you shall know the real meaning of wants and needs from the lenses of peoples heart! You will know why people give up and you will have a better understanding why some people dare unrelentingly to be remembered for something unique when you get to know things that are on people’s heart. The heart is a room with so many issues!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: food-for-thought, heart-issues, heart-quotes, heartbreak, robust-and-focused

quote: Don’t rush, just because you have reasons! Reason with the reasons and take definite action in the right direction, in haste, where needed, or with patience, where it is essential to do so! Mind your thought and think about your action!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action, agility, calmness-and-attitude, food-for-thought, in-haste, storms-of-life-quotes, timing-is-everything

quote: Each year comes with its own memories! Memories that make us ponder! Memories that shake our nerves and thought to think about things we did, things we could have done, things we should have done, the right time and timing for the yes and no we could have say with courage or humility, the right time and timing of our steps and things we should have never done! When you remember the year, you remember something! Something good or something bad!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: food-for-thought, footprints, humor, memories, ponder, reflections, regrets-of-yesterday, resolutions, reviews

quote: If God is your coach, you score the most amazing and unbelievable goals
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: doing-the-will-of-god, food-for-thought, god-s-purpose, living-life

quote: something must go within to bring what is within out. Oh yes! You need something within to bring what is within out!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: crime, food-for-thought, giving, giving-and-receiving, inside-out, interrogations, investigations, the-truth, what-is-within

quote: A mind without a secret is with a question mark! A mind with so many secrets shall attract an exclamation one day!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: food-for-thought, humor, secrets, the-tongue, thought, wise-words

quote: Do what you have to do as you must do it, and exert all your noble strength in doing it in so far as it pleases God, and give less attention to the approval or disapproval of men, though put their thoughts into consideration and take the lessons from their thoughts seriously. Factor the thoughts of the masses into changing the face of your vision as you journey to it and be happy and more confident about where you want to get to. Seek not for fame but let it inspire you to the top. Mind your real aim notwithstanding the obstacles and failure you shall meet. Do your best to present your best to God for from Him comes your daily breath!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: adversities, confidence-and-attitude, daily-inspiration, fame, food-for-thought, fulfilling-your-purpose, lessons-of-life, oppositions-in-life, pleasing-god, purposeful-life, staying-focused, the-journey-to-greatness, words-of-wisdom

quote: I thought of this, tell me whether it is true or false; you do not know something, you cannot know everything and you can miss anything
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: arrogance, attitude-quotes, food-for-thought, ignorance, life, pride, quotes, wise

quote: Before you cut down the tree, think of the birds that take refuge on it
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: decision-making, empathy, food-for-thought, life, life-challenges, opposition, pride, sympathy

quote: The tongue never rests. It speaks even when we sleep. It speaks through the mind even when the mouth keeps shut
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: food-for-thought, know-when-to-talk, meditation-quotes, mind-power, pondering, talkertives, the-tongue, thinking-quotes, tongue, wondering

quote: Technology has given the dumb a tongue
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: abusing-technology, food-for-thought, paradox, paradox-of-silence, paradoxical-statement, technological-evolution, technology

quote: Stop making things of less value your food for thought each moment of time! Your mind is precious. Mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: don-t-disappoint-yourself, food-for-thought, inspire-yours, mind-your-mind, think-about-something, think-positively, think-well, thought, words-of-wisdom

quote: What a paradox it is, the sane causes more problems than the insane! It is! The real problems of the world do not come from the insane but, the sane!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: fallacy, fantasies, food-for-thought, humor, insanity, life, life-issues, logic, logical-thinking, philosophy, problems-of-today, rationality, reasoning, sanity, thinkers, thought

quote: until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-courageous, be-yourself-quote, daily-quotes, dare-to-win, do-it, fear, food-for-thought, have-courage, just-do-it, life, make-it-happen, our-relevance-on-earth, procrastination, quotes-about-fear, think-and-act-well, words-of-wisdom, your-dreams-must-not-die

quote: A real value of our lives is in how we use our time as we journey from the womb to the tomb. A great difference between the womb and the tomb is the w and the t! Wasted time! We waste great and precious time as we journey from the womb to the tomb; in the end, we remember the w and the t in a simple statement of regret, 'had I known' ! The wasted time!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, double-standards, food-for-thought, indecisiveness, inspirational-quotes, life, make-each-day-count, planning-life, regrets, regrets-of-the-past, the-essence-of-life, the-essence-of-time, the-journey-of-life, the-value-of-time, thought, time, time-management-quotes, wasted-time, words-of-wisdom

quote: shift your focus to achieve your purpose. Life is all about change!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anxiety, be-positive-quotes, change-your-life, change-your-mood, facing-challenges, food-for-thought, optimism, pessimism, shift, stay-focused, worrying-about-the-future, worrying-over-nothing, worrying-quotes

quote: Think of the end when you begin! Though the end may not be all that certain, you are sure of getting something, mostly and surprisingly, above the target in the end! Bind yourself to Persistence and tenacity, courage and vigor, Wisdom and faith, and dare unrelentingly! Sometimes it is never okay to feel okay at all. Some shall continue to feel okay until they meet what would tell them what they could have done whilst feeling okay! So it was in the days of the Fig tree. It thought portraying its flourishing leaves would have pleased Jesus Christ but Jesus needed a fruit! We are all having flourishing leaves (life,) but think of the fruits we must bear (living) when it is time to bear them, in season and out of season! May enough be enough and when you feel you have had enough, may you be pushed by enough to go beyond enough and dare to live a distinctive footprint! It all begins with a step and ends with a step! Start your day with vigor and an utmost tenacity and end your day with something! Be poised to do something distinctive each day for that is all life is about! Life is an adventurous journey and you cannot forever skip mistakes but if you make a mistake, learn from the mistake, do something with the mistake and avoid that mistake happening again and you least did made a mistake! You only took a different root than the usual to your final destination. The meaning we have given to words is what makes words have meaning! Breathe whilst you have breath and do something with the air you breathe whilst you have breath!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action, attitude-quotes, conformity, do-something-today, food-for-thought, footprints, lessons-for-man, life-is-an-adventure, make-each-day-count, mind-your-time, persistence-quotes, quote-for-today, tenacity-quotes, think-of-the-end, thought, time, time-management-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: Notwithstanding how uncanny moments of life might be, you never walk backwards. Once you take a step, you move forward by a step with a step. That is life! Even a child would never crawl backward and so would streams hardly flow backward. Just keep moving when it is a must to move!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-step-forward, food-for-thought, keep-moving-forward, life, life-lessons, take-a-step, thought, wisdom-words, wise-sayings

quote: Instead of saying maybe in May, let May be!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-new-day-quotes, attitude-quotes, bad-attitude, do-your-best, excuses, food-for-thought, make-each-day-count, may-quotes, maybe-someday, procrastination-quotes, thought, wisdom-words

quote: There are always certain things which are certain and there are always certain things which are uncertain for us to think about each day and when such things are over, there shall always be something to think about
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anxiety, attitude, certainties, confusion, fear, food-for-thought, quotes-about-life, thinking-about-money, thinking-about-something, thinking-deeply, thinking-too-much, thought, uncertainties-of-life, wise-sayings, worry, worrying-over-nothing

quote: There are always certain things which are certain and certain things which are uncertain for us to think about each day and when such are over, there shall always be something to think about
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anxiety, attitude, certainties, confusion, fear, food-for-thought, quotes-about-life, thinking-about-money, thinking-about-something, thinking-deeply, thinking-too-much, thought, uncertainties-of-life, wise-sayings, worry, worrying-over-nothing

quote: Time is the pivot of life activities. When you miss a second, you miss a time in your lifetime! Time is undoubtedly the greatest asset one can ever acquire. The ultimate and real time is in the mind. Time is thought and thought is time. To mind your time, mind your thought! To mind your life, mind your time!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: ambition-quotes, attitude-quotes, food-for-thought, idleness-quote, life-and-time, lifetime, mind-your-llife, mind-your-time, seconds, time, time-flies, time-management-quotes, time-mangement, time-usage, work-and-attitude

quote: ignorance to a certain degree can be corrected but, it shall always be an effort in futility to correct a certain degree of ignorance!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: do-the-right-things, do-what-matters, food-for-thought, ignorance-quotes, ignore-ignorance, life

quote: real silence is silence without words, silence that speaks words in silence and silence that talks better than words
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: food-for-thought, ponder, silence, silence-is-golden, silence-quote, silence-speaks, stay-silent, words-and-silence, words-of-wisdom

quote: Better choose silence than bitter words which shall leave nothing but bitter footprints
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action-quotes, better-words, bitter-words, food-for-thought, keep-mute, reasons, silence, silence-can-speak

quote: So many people shall regret three great things tomorrow; things they did, things they did not do and things they were yet to do!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: decision-making, do-it-well-today, food-for-thought, free-mind, had-i-know, regrets, things-we-hate, things-we-love, three-great-things-to-know, tomorrow-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: Mind your mind. Think of distinctive footprints. Insofar as all things move forward and not backward, avoid retrogressive thinking, imprison negative thoughts, build a strong wall against negativity , be optimistic enough to deduce the optimisms in pessimism and think ahead of time. Understand the time you have and know what to do with the time, for time can loose it essence with time. If you ignore the real reasons why you wake up each day, you ignore the real reason why you continue to live each day. Life is just once so take the chance and mind your mind
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-new-day-quotes, be-positive-quotes, change-your-mind, dare-to-do-something, do-something, do-something-in-the-day, food-for-thought, life, live-in-the-moment, mind-your-mind, mind-your-own-business, mindset, negative-thoughts, optimism-quotes, pessimism, retrogressive-thinking, take-actions-on-your-dreams, take-chances, the-little-things, think-ahead-of-time, think-of-distinctive-footprints, thoughts

quote: Certain coincidence is wonderful. Certain meetings are memorable. Sometimes you meet some people for just a moment and they leave indelible footprints on your mind. They give you the reasons to ponder over and over. They become your food for thought. Though they go, their presence is felt within the innermost of the heart and the soul; especially when such people were a reason for a smile, or they were a perfect fit for a vacuum or probably they were a heavenly sent or maybe they were an epitome of a great union; when their light could shine to brighten the dark side of our lives; when they knew how to arouse interest even in the face of dull atmosphere; when they did understand silence and know the value and power of words; when even their absence is felt more than their presence. You can’t just forget about such people. Though they leave, they live within our hearts, mind, body and soul.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: best-partner-for-life, coincidence, companionship-quotes, food-for-thought, heart-issues, life, love, love-quotes, love-story-for-true-love

quote: the great mountain when seen from a distance shall always seem closer to us but to get to it, and to climb to its apex to get the best view, we may need to take and experience the real walk with resilience and tenacity.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-journey-to-the-mountain, ambitions, facing-challenges, food-for-thought, love, mission, overcoming-challenges-quotes, purpose, real-life, reasons-for-action, resilience, tenacity, thought, vision, visionary-leader

quote: It will surprise you. It will keep you mute. it will make you ponder. It will ignite your passion. It will dumb fold you. It will invoke your joy. It will kick your pain away. It will shake your envy. It will shove your slothfulness.It will wake you up. It will turn your thought. It will inspire you. It will give you reasons. It will harness your potentials. It trigger your power.It will grease your body. It will electrify your nerves. It will make you giggle. It will shake your body. It will make you inquire and enquire.It will leave you in wonder. That is it!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: food-for-thought, philosophy, philosophy-of-life, ponder, reasons, that-is-it

quote: Great men do not experience small challenges. They face great challenge but that is what makes them great. That is what give them great story. That is what inspires them to live and leave distinctive footprints on minds. Though they face great challenges, they gather great momentum and strength to fight such challenges with fortitude and tenacity to the satisfaction of their inner man. Great men, though they face great challenges, they always come out of the challenges as great men with great stories. They live and leave distinctive footprints of life on minds
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude, challenges, challenges-of-life, difficulties-of-life, do-something, don-t-give-up, footprints, fortitude, great-men-and-women, great-men-quotes, great-people, hard-times, inspirational-life, life, life-stories, tenacity, thought, tough-times

quote: when you do great things, think as if you missed the mark by an inch; walk as if you are yet to face the greatest task; talk as if you are yet to have the best preparation for the momentous moment and dream as if you are fighting a battalion of tasks
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: complacency, doing-great-things, dream, foresight, inspirational-quotes, life, living-the-dream, mediocrity, preparation, preparation-to-face-the-day, task, vision

quote: Sometimes you welcome people only for them to show you how unwelcoming you are. Sometimes you generously help people only for them to show you how extravagant and evil you are. Sometimes you teach people only for them to show you how ignorant you are. Sometimes you open your doors to people only for them to show you how dirty your room is. Sometimes you make way for people only for them to block your ways. Sometimes you draw people closer to you only for them to teach you the real meaning of betrayal and loneliness. Sometimes you smile to people only for them to show you the color of your teeth. Sometimes you play with people only for them to show you how uncouth you are. In life, sometimes, your very best intentions shall be seen as woefully bad. Sometimes in life, your very good deeds and acts would see another meaning, but no matter how people perceive, accept and treat you or your good intentions, acts and deeds, know yourself, and dare not to be changed by circumstances so easily! Regardless of how hurtful circumstances might be, dare to guard your heart and your tongue, so you may not speak what you should never say that can make you miss your reward from the Sovereign Lord. Keep doing what you have to do, as you have to do, as a living sacrifice to your Father who is in Heaven, knowing that your reward is from Him alone, and wait patiently with a calm and an understanding heart for your reward from Him, regardless of the arduous nature of the hurt and trials!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: betrayals, bitterness, intentions, kindness, pain-quotes, revenge, ungrateful-people, ungratefulness

quote: To make wealth wisdom, one needs to be wise. Wisdom may be able to wear the suit of wealth but wealth may not be able to wear the suit of wisdom
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainyquote, life, life-lessons, wealth, wisdom

quote: Turn your loneliness into singing and praying, and you shall realize that you are never alone at all
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: loneliness, praying, singing

quote: Loneliness isn't a disease, it is only a moment to learn something better
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-is-everything, choices, feeling-lonely, loneliness, solitude

quote: Giving up on a purposeful journey of life is as deadly as death! When you pursue with tenacity, and strive through the adversities and the vicissitudes of life with a mind of fortitude and get to the end of the journey, you shall surely see life. Awake! Arise and go! Never ever give up!!!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: challenges, depression-quotes, don-t-give-up, failure-quotes, fortitude, go-ahead, keep-your-head-up, life-changes, loneliness, problems-in-life, tenacity-quotes, the-journey-of-life, the-journey-to-success, thought, vicissitudes-of-life

quote: In the art and act of mastering, a mistake is a common thing, but it must always shape something and it must always give a distinctive reason for action!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: development, growth, learning-from-mistakes, mastering, mistakes

quote: though aging reduces speed, it increases experience and understanding
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: aging, experience-quotes, life, old-age, old-age-quotes, the-journey-of-life, time-changes, understanding-oneself-and-others, wise-words

quote: If you cannot be happy with the little you have, you can be confused with the lot you want to have
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, be-yourself-quotes, contentment, envy-quotes, stay-focused, stay-positive, take-it-easy, think-well, wise-words

quote: The mind never sleeps. Though the body can be idle, there shall always be something for the mind to do! Do something with your mind then!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: do-something-with-your-mind, footprints-of-life, idleness-quote, mind-power, think-well, thought, wise-quotes, wise-words

quote: When you put on a new cloth with the same attitude, you are only changing the diet that goes into the same stomach!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, change-position, change-quotes, change-your-life, inspirational-quotes, real-change, the-best-change, wise-words, words-of-wisdom

quote: one big problem and a great paradox in the arena of life is the problem of where or how a person is now and what, who and where he wants to be or have tomorrow. Had it not be this problem, we would have been relaxing all day long
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: life, paradox-of-life, problems-in-life, self-esteem, tomorrow, unhappiness, unhappy-people, vision-facing-challenges, worry

quote: if you keep a distance to get a respect, keep a distance to keep the respect
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: dignity, dignity-quotes, gaining-respect, gaining-respect-from-others, honor, keeping-a-distance, living-a-noble-life, living-great, nobility, reasoning, self-actualizaton, self-esteem

quote: Until you press the switch button of the light in your room on, you shall always have light in your room and still leave in darkness.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-confused-life, action, action-than-words, complacency, do-something, excuses, good-life, happiness, joyful-living, living-in-pain, look, look-beyond-what-you-look, mediocrity, see, suffering, talk-is-cheap, wisdom

quote: Don’t stop breathing just because night has fallen! Don't stop breathing just because you are sleeping
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: challenges, difficult-times, do-it, do-it-again, don-t-give-up, don-t-quit, move-on, moving-on-quotes, suicide

quote: Death is not the end! The exit for the world of mortals is the entrance to the world of immortals!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: confused-mind, death, ending-it, perplexity, suicidal-thoughts, suicide

quote: Don’t kill yourself just because you think and feel you are empty. God needs empty vessels to fill!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bad-mood, dejected, emptiness, feeling-lonely, rejected, suicide, when-things-go-wrong

quote: Because of the past, so many people are living in the past! No one is free from the past, but we are free to choose to move from the past into the present or stay in the past, though we live in the present!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: confusion-and-attitude, failure, memories-quotes, painful-memories, regrets, the-past

quote: If only you want the best, do it till you get the best though all see is the worst! Don't ever give up on the rest, and rest; time changes!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: challenge-and-attitude, challenges, do-it-again, failure, pursue, tenacity, try

quote: It always feels good and comforting to relax whilst there is work to be done but, it feels fulfilling to work hard, overcome slothfulness and challenges with tenacity and achieve your aim when you should have relaxed
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: comfort, don-t-give-up, failure, fulfilling-your-destiny, slothfulness, tenacity, troubles

quote: If you fail to control your thought, your thought will never fail to control you! Master the art of controlling your thought better and your thought will control you better
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: control-your-mind, control-your-thought, control-yourself, failure, fear-quotes, mind-you-mind, nobility, thought

quote: The boiling water that does not cool down only dries out!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: advice, advice-for-daily-living, anger, arrogance-and-attitude

quote: Everything is a choice and every choice has a consequence; a good one or bad one! We choose to choose every day, whether we choose not to choose, but it is not all our choices that result in something better! It is not all our choices that result in something lasting! It is not all our choices that result in something fulfilling. No matter what our daily conscious and unconscious choices result in, the lessons from the results of our choices that can help shape our next choices must never be neglected, for they that shall neglect the lessons from the consequences of their choices shall always choose and choose again and again, and in the end, they shall never see any lasting and fulfilling footprints!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: advice, cautions, choose-well, imperfection-quotes, life-choices

quote: If the pocket goes dry but the mind is fertile, awake and plant something noble in the mind and you shall surely reap something noble in the end, no matter what!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: money-quotes, no-money, poverty, thinking-about-your-problems

quote: A sure way a country can develop is through a true development of the masses. Yes! A sure way to ensure a true freedom of the people is for the people take up their own destiny into their hands and bond their strengths to positively dare with a clear vision and fortitude like the eagle for a great change in wisdom and in peace, devoid of rebellious motive, massacre and nepotism, and with tenacity, direct the thought, policy and inspiration of the few people who rule the masses for the best change ever! Until this is done, the masses shall always cry out of ignorance, not knowing the real power within them and beg at the feet of the few people for how they should live their lives!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: blind-politics, development, freedom-of-the-masses, ignorance, ignorance-quotes, inequality, nepotism, political-philosophy, political-promises, political-propaganda, political-quotes, political-science, politics, poor-governance, poverty, poverty-alleviation, power-of-the-masses, the-future, the-future-of-our-children, your-destiny-is-in-your-hands, your-life-is-in-your-hands

quote: Writers are the ink of society
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: authors, writers

quote: Because of grace so many people will miss salvation
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: grace, salvation-quotes

quote: Not until you change your lens, true beauty shall always look ugly to you!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anger-and-attitude, anger-management, emotional-intelligence, ignorance, look-and-see, perspective, understanding

quote: A better understanding is a good factor in all things for it gives good reasons for good actions, but to come to a certain understanding, you need to get a certain understanding!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: choices-and-consequences, decisions-and-actions, decisions-in-life, planning-quotes, understanding

quote: Let there be light! Abba! Father, let there be light!In our dark moments we cry; let there be light!Light to show us the way; light to shine before all others!Light to see through darkness; light to change all staleness!Let there be light! Abba! Father, we cry, let there be light!Let there be light! Abba! Father, let there be light!The future is always truly uncertain; let there be light!Light to shine on the snares of darkness; light to take steps with calmness!Light for us to see our paths well; light for us to understand your ways well!Let there be light! Abba! Father, we cry, let there be light!Let there be light! Abba! Father, let there be light!We do not know who is coming in the darkness; let there be light!Light to blindfold the attacker; light to change the sinner!Light to give us power; light to make all things better!Let there be light! Abba! Father, we cry, let there be light!Let there be light! Abba! Father, let there be light!We need freedom to do your work; let there be light!Light to free us from bondage; light to escape attackers’ carnage!Light to lead us into your sonship; Light to empower our sonship!Let there be light! Abba! Father, we cry, let there be light!Let there be light! Abba Father, let there be light!We need your light to know the truth; let there be light!Light to enlighten our understanding; light to overcome misunderstanding!Light to withstand strongholds; light to empower our goals!Let there be light! Abba! Father, we cry, let there be light!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: challenging-times, christian-living, christian-walk, confusion, difficult-moments, freedom-in-christ, god-s-will, hymn, let-there-be-light, the-light-of-god, trying-times, understanding

quote: Understanding has no cost, yet, it is too expensive for some people to purchase
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: ignorance-quotes, misunderstanding, understanding

quote: Beware! Your mind is a target!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: guard-your-mind, ignorance, mind-power, mindset-quotes, thought, understanding, wisdom

quote: A good oration is good and a good understanding is better, but a good action in the right direction that gets the best results is the best!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action, oration, results, right-action, speech, understanding

quote: So many people have understanding, but in reality, they don’t really understand understanding! When you really understand understanding, you get a real understanding!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: life, puzzles-of-life, understanding, understanding-oneself-and-others

quote: There is no better place as better as where God has placed you, be it good or bad, for His better reasons. Just keep calm and be humble and diligent enough to learn the better and real reasons that shall take and place you at the best place He wants to place you! If you don’t understand the lessons, ask Him for the reasons. If He answers you fine, if not, just keep going and keep learning the lessons. You shall definitely get a good understanding in the end!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-life, content, contentment-and-attitude, humility, lessons-of-life, perseverance-quotes, trials-of-life, understanding

quote: What is in your mind position or disposition your mind, body and spirit in the best or worst way. What you are yet to accept into your mind exposes your mind to and keep your mind on what you are yet to accept and what has not yet come into your mind least controls your mind, body and spirit. Mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: be-mindful-of-your-mind, behave-well, fear, fearing-the-unknown, feed-your-mind-well, guard-your-thought, mind-power, negative-thought, think-great, think-positively, think-well, understanding, understanding-oneself-and-others, what-is-yet-to-happen, what-matters-in-life

quote: When a true purpose refuses to breathe, it suffocates to its ebb and death!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action, consistency, determination, living-the-dream, persistence, purpose

quote: Mind what you mind. Do not just open the door of your mind to anything at all you don’t want to mind. Mind the things that get closer to your mind and mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action, concentration, mind-power, mind-your-mind, negative-thinking, thought

quote: Comfort without action is only discomfort and dissatisfaction in latent action. It always seems we shall have a good tomorrow until a bad tomorrow comes
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-good-day, accidents, action, comfort, comfort-zone, comfortable-life, discomfort, life, life-in-action, living-in-comfort, mind-today, mind-your-mind, plan-well, thin-of-tomorrow, thought, tomorrow-quotes, uncertainties-in-life

quote: When the same lessons of life that taught them teaches you, you get a good understanding of what made them become who and what they became; you appreciate them better and you uphold the dignity of their integrity in high esteem!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: criticism-quotes, critics, experience, founding-fathers, great-men-and-women, judging-others, trials-and-tribulations

quote: He who knows the past well can best explain the present and can tell the probable certainties and uncertainties of the future better
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: certainties, experience, experiences-and-adventures, forcasting, precautions, predictable-life, predictions, taking-action, taking-risks, the-future, the-future-outcmes-of-your-life, the-past, the-past-never-ends, the-present-and-future, the-present-moment, uncertainties, unpredictable-future, unpredictable-situations, what-the-past-did

quote: So many people understand language, but few people understand the real meaning of language. They that understand the meaning of language understand language and life better!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: language, language-understanding, speaking, speech

quote: Language lives in the mind, moves around with the tongue and gets its meaning in action!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: impact-of-language, language, the-meaning-of-language

quote: You are where your energy is and you get something from where your energy goes!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: diligence, hard-work, life, mind-power, mind-your-time, value, your-energy

quote: Comfort, though can be a real reason for mediocrity and conformity, improves speed and enhances mind power greatly!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: comfort, confused-mind, discomfort, happiness-quotes, mind-power

quote: People who don’t know the power of their mind shall only have power without power
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: inspirational-quotes, know-your-worth, knowlwedge, mind-power, personal-value, power-within, power-without-power, wisdom

quote: The reverse gear of time is the mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: change-your-life, life, mind-power, mindset, thought, time-quote, time-wasted, understanding-life

quote: I tell you the truth, if you will leave your life based on the whims and caprices of men, you shall be like the corn in popcorn machine
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: controlling-your-emotions, life, mind-control, mind-power, mindset, stay-focused

quote: Your mind is not just the wonderful power house that empowers your action and steps or the driver of your life but a wonderful city. A city in which people and things you think about dwell. Create therefore an effective and efficient licensing office in the city of your thought that will ensure that the right people and things live there. Do well to ensure that you differentiate between people and things that should stay permanently, those that should be just passersby and that which should not even get closer to this wonderful city. If you allow anything at all into this city, the city shall be filled with anything at all and you shall think about anything at all. Mind your mind!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: choices-and-consequences, life, mind-power, optimism-quotes, pessimism-quotes, positive-attitude, right-thinking, thought, wandering-mind

quote: Take it easy when you are busy! It shall never be easy but, take it easy!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: absence, attitude-quotes, be-happy-with-your-life, confusion-and-attitude, difficulties-of-life, life, mind-power, pressure-quotes, sound-mind, stay-calm, take-it-easy, tension

quote: Knowing your ignorance is far better than knowing what you know! Understanding the path and will of God is far better than mastering your own path.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: pride, self-awareness, will-of-god

quote: I came on earth for something, I must do something, and I must live and leave not just anything, but something!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: awake, do-something-unique, living-with-a-purpose, regrets, self-awareness

quote: I came to the earth for something, I must do something, and I must live and leave not just anything, but something!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: awake, do-something-unique, living-with-a-purpose, regrets, self-awareness, why-on-earth

quote: Until you truly learn how to act well, you shall always act only for your actions to teach you how to act well
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: act-well, anger, ignorance, think-and-act

quote: We fight because we fail to understand why really we fight
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anger, conflict, fighting

quote: We fight because we fail to really understand why we fight
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anger, anger-and-attitude, conflict, fighting

quote: If you fail to know how to move with people without emotional discipline, you shall surely become the color of their emotions whenever they go beyond the boundaries of their emotions to display the real and true color of their emotions
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anger, anger-and-attitude, emotional-intelligence, emotional-pain, emotions, reasoning

quote: Explain yourself when it is a must, but sometimes, in life, keep quit when people think you are mad or you shall speak and speak how mad they think you are!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anger, annoyance, attitude-quotes, keep-calm, know-when-to-speak, temptations, words-and-silence

quote: There is always something behind what is wrong and to change what is wrong, mind the things behind what is wrong! So many people are quick enough to see what is wrong only, and they criticize so blindly! When you see what is wrong, see why, who and what is behind what is wrong.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accusations, anger, attitude-quotes, choices, criticism-quotes, finding-solutions, look-and-see, thought

quote: when your emotions are in motion, take a break and ponder!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anger, anger-and-attitude, anger-management, emotions, emotions-and-attitude, emotions-and-control, emotions-quotes, heart-issues, heartbreak, life, loneliness-quotes, love-quotes, psyche

quote: Your little r changes the status of a single lady ‘Ms’ into a respectable lady ‘Mrs’. Man, you make the difference!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: fathers-day, fathers-day-quotes, man, respect-men, the-power-of-a-man, woman

quote: The real certainties and uncertainties of tomorrow are hidden to all. We however hope for a tomorrow to do what we have to do tomorrow because we think we shall surely have a tomorrow. Worry therefore not about tomorrow and understand instead that once there shall be a tomorrow, there shall be a good tomorrow. If there shall be a good tomorrow, then there shall be a good tomorrow for you. Stay positive!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: certainties, happy-yourself, inspirational-quotes, make-it-happen, make-yourself-happy, optimi, stay-positive, think-positively, thinking, thought, tomorrow, tomorrow-quotes, tomorrow-will-be-better, uncertainties, uncertainties-in-life, worrying-over-nothing

quote: If God is not the reason, I have no reason! If Jesus Christ is not my friend, I have no friend!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-walk, doubt, hate

quote: It takes just one day to remember one day! Mind today, for one day, you shall remember one day
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: memories, memories-of-love, the-past

quote: Aging is something! It always makes you remember yesterday!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: aging, growing-up, memories, old-age

quote: Each new day, our minds grow older; the better or bitter daily lesson that makes our minds grow older is the matter!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: daily-life, daily-living, lessons-of-life, memories, new-day-quotes

quote: Each new day, our minds grow older; the mediocre, bitter or better daily lesson that makes our minds grow older is the matter!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: daily-life, daily-living, lessons-of-life, memories, new-day-quotes

quote: Life is full of days and each day comes with its own happenstances; good and unbearable ones! Some days are remembered, for though such days come and go, they leave their memorable footprints on our minds; footprints of difficulties, footprints of sweetness and joy, footprints of regrets, and footprints worth pondering over and over! Until something happens to you in the day, you shall least remember that moment of time and day in your lifetime!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-new-day, each-day-quotes, memorable-days, memories, opportunities, regrets

quote: the more the tree goes up in the air, the more it goes down into the earth. Remember humility in greatness.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: down-to-earth, greatness, greatness-quotes, humility-in-greatness, humility-quotes, life, living-in-humility, pride, psyche, self-control

quote: notwithstanding how good a seed my be, it's proper germination,growth and fruit bearing may be mutilated if not planted in a good soil
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anchoring, direction-of-greatness, direction-quotes, fruit-bearing, greatness, motivational-quotes, mutilation, people-inspire-people, people-relations, psychoanalysis, purpose-in-life, seed, soil-for-growth, supporting-others

quote: A conscious understanding of the kind of cloth we wear, each moment of time, makes us be aware of what we must do or what we should never think of doing because of the cloth we wear!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: honesty, integrity, self-awareness-quotes, taking-steps, think-before-you-act

quote: It is only when the mirror has not spoken to Chimpanzee in a plain language that it thinks it looks more better than the Gorilla
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: comparison, envy, humor, ignorance, life, mind-your-own-business

quote: It is a mere needless thing to fight with ignorance with all your true strength except you can educate and change ignorance with wit and wisdom
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: fight, ignorance, misunderstanding

quote: He who loves lies suffers from no disease than lies! He who believes in and acts upon lies suffers from no disease than ignorance!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: humor, ignorance, ignorance-quotes, lies, lying, lying-quotes

quote: A certain amount of impatience can be good to do the good works excessive patience delays to do, but sometimes, it is good to have a little amount of patience, for a little amount of patience can be a big antidote to a big woe of impatience
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anger-quotes, attitude, delays, heart-issues, ignorance, impatience, inspirational-quotes, patience-and-timing

quote: A blind ingenuity goes nowhere
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: humor, ignorance, ingenuity, intellectualism

quote: the paradox of human ignorance is the most intriguing paradox of nature
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: ignorance, life, life-puzzles, paradox-of-our-time, purpose-of-life, the-power-of-ignorance, what-ignorance-can-do

quote: Just imagine what you are losing just because you are not reading!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-reading-nation, books, ignorance, reading-habits, wisdom-in-books, world-book-day

quote: If you want courage, kill fear and blindfold ignorance
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, courage-quotes, daring-quotes, determination-quotes, fear, focused-mindset, ignorance, life, quotes-about-fear, starting-something-new, stay-positive, stay-strong, taking-a-new-step

quote: The only deadly disease I have seen that is causing great harm and massacre latently yet the world has ignored is ignorance!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-deadly-disease, ignorance, ignorance-quotes, life, problems-of-today, things-that-matter, what-people-are-ignoring, woes-of-the-world

quote: Life is an act and we are the actors of life. Some are able to act well but some are crippled by the fear of fear. Be it good or bad, great or mediocre, we all do take steps in life; sometimes out of ignorance, out of pain, out of love, out of hatred, out of comfort and sometimes out of jealousy. We may slip as we take these steps in life but when we realize what we should have done, we ought to regret and take action
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action-time, desires, fear, ignorance, lost-love, love-quotes, mistakes, mistakes-quotes, mistakes-we-make, out-of-hatred, regrets, regretting, repentance, taking-actions-on-your-desires, understanding-our-steps, what-we-should-have-done

quote: when the uncertainty is known, certainty is guaranteed. Until we unravel the uncertainties of our lives, we shall always be uncertain with the life we live
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-guaranteed-life, certainty, fear, finding-the-right-answers, ignorance, investigations, life, living-assured, living-in-fear, mysteries, mysteries-of-life, suspense, uncertainty

quote: the apostles of mediocrity shall always stand to defend mediocrity out of mediocrity
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: apostles, defending-mediocrity, ignorance, ignorance-quotes, living-great, mediocre-people, mediocrity-and-happiness, oppositions-in-life, oppositions-to-great-purpose, true-purpose-in-life, wisdom

quote: they that reject and disregard the unripe fruits are they that enjoy the ripe fruits
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: disregarded, fruits, ignorance, pain, rejected, rejections

quote: Where ignorance prevails, there an opportunity exists but the possessor of ignorance shall always be ignorant of opportunities
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: brainy-quote, ignorance, inspirational-quotes, life-lessons, purpose

quote: One day ask your daughter the kind of mother she wants to be! One day ask your son the kind of father he wants to be! One day ask yourself the kind of parent you have been! And one day, ask yourself how you have run the race of life through the good and the bad times with the baton of life in your hands!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: adulthood, growing-up, parenting, parenting-advice, parents-and-children, the-journey-of-life

quote: Let us do our best whilst we live for another tomorrow is coming when whilst we are long gone, another group of people shall come to either suffer from our worst or enjoy and build upon our best. Let us run whole heatedly today with all alacrity for another generation shall come for the baton from our hands to either blame us or congratulate us on how we lived the dream and journeyed in life through the good and the bad times; another generation shall come to ponder over our footprints as a good or a bad lesson for them! Let us run with all necessary zeal such that when we hand over the baton, our next generation will have no reason but to soldier on with courage, enthusiasm and absolute commitment to get to the finishing line with a great accomplishment and a noble story worth pondering over and over!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accomplishments, accountability, do-your-best, footprints, governance, mentoring, parenting, the-baton-of-life

quote: Know sincere well through the real acts of sincere and not just through its mere words and deceptive actions that end in deep regret before you give your true heart to sincere. So many people have trusted because of sincere but they only saw the mere word and image of sincere and not the real meaning and action of sincere!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: broken-heart, deception-quotes, lies, sincere, truth

quote: Life cannot be without food; when we destroy the lands that give food, we destroy the foods that give life!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: agriculture, food, food-security, hunger

quote: He who doesn’t regard agriculture will truly value it when food becomes scarce!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: agric, backyard-garden, farmers, food

quote: You can speak loudly with deep silence
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: annoying-people, deep-silence, silence, words-and-silence

quote: When silence become silent, it speaks silently but loudly
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: fear-silence, keep-shut, latent-action, silence, silence-speaks, the-power-of-silence

quote: one day I will tell you a story. A story that will make you ponder. A story that will make you wonder. A story that will give you another story. One day I will tell you a story. A story about life. A story about my life. One day I will tell you a story!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: anguish, behind-the-scenes, behind-the-smile, ernest-agyemang-yeboah, good-times, hard-times-quotes, life, life-of-an-author, life-stories, perplexities, reasons-for-failure, reasons-to-be-happy, silence

quote: The duty of the one who wants to be silent is to be silent, period! Give little thought to the cacophony of the masses when silence is the best option and silence will speak for itself
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: action-quotes, actions-over-words, attitude-quotes, cacophony, don-t-talk-too-much, let-silence-speak, reasons-to-be-silent, shut-up, silence, silence-can-speak, staying-calm, staying-focused, thought, words-and-silence

quote: real silence is silence without words, silence that speak words in silence and silence that talks better than words
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: ponder, silence, silence-is-golden, silence-quote, silence-speaks, stay-silent, words-and-silence, words-of-wisdom

quote: When a man goes silent on his ways and plans, you must ponder!

category: conspiracy, invasion, life, love, love-quotes, ponder, preparations, raid, silence, silence-is-golden, silence-quote, silence-speaks, what-silence-can-do

quote: One of the most powerful lessons silence teaches us is to ponder

quote: One of the most powerful lessons silence teach us is to ponder

category: deep-thoughts, detractors, lessons-in-silence, life, life-lessons, life-lessons-quotes, ponder, reasoning, reasoning-to-win, silence, solitude-quotes, thinking-deep

quote: Deep despair, dear Lord, deep despairMy heart yearns to be your heirBut my prayer remains unheardSpeak to me that I may hearAnd I will know that you can hearDeep despair, dear Lord Jesus , deep despair !Deep despair, dear Lord, deep despairYour voice I wait to hearYour presence I seek to be nearThat I may not live with fearAnd I will always be your heirDeep despair, dear Lord Jesus, deep despair! Deep despair, dear Lord , deep despairWhen expectations become desperationMay your might be my light That I may see you as my guideAnd do all things in your mightDeep despair, dear Lord Jesus, deep despair !Deep despair, dear Lord , deep despairMay I know who You really areThat I may know who I am really areAs I stand between my me and where I want to beIn a world that seeks hinder all I have to be Deep despair, dear Lord Jesus, deep despair!Deep despair, dear Lord, deep despairWhen all hope is goneAnd all I have leave my handsMay I smile for what you have doneAs You overcome condemnation with redemptionDeep despair, dear Lord Jesus, deep despair!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-life, despair, hope, hymns, life, prayer-quotes

quote: In your walk with Christ, you shall meet crises, but, when crises arise, remember Christ!

category: a-walk-with-jesus, christian-life, crises, faith, living-with-christ, obedience-quotes, problems-in-life

quote: Blessed are they that have faith for they shall take steps like a blind man!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-life, christian-living, christian-quotes, do-it-at-any-age, faith, life, moving-in-faith, understanding-god, walk-in-faith

quote: when you are surrendering your all to God and if God is taking you somewhere, focus less where He is taking you to, For He will definitely take you somewhere. Only surrender
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-step-to-god, christian-life, deciding-for-christ, living-for-christ, power-of-god, purposes-of-god, surrendering-to-god, the-ways-of-god, the-will-of-god, waiting-quotes

quote: At the sixes and sevens of our mindlead us oh Lord in Thy mightIn the moment to decide on our planslead us oh Lord with Thy planin the middle of uncountable decisionslead us oh Lord with Thy decisionour heart desires, our mind hopesLead us oh Lord, lead us oh LordTo the abode of satisfaction, lead us!In the insatiable desires of lifeLead us oh Lord with Thy lightPeace we want, fulfillment we desireLead us oh Lord with Thy powerIn the unending trials and temptations of lifeLead us oh Lord with Thy lightour heart desires, our mind hopesLead us oh Lord, lead us oh lordTo the abode of satisfaction, lead us!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: christian-life, christian-living, christian-quotes, decision-time, hymns, hymns-of-purpose, insatiable-desires, lead-us-lord, peace-within, satisfaction, sixes-and-sevens, taking-a-decision, taking-action, time-christianity

quote: Lets us not just read the Bible; let us learn it; let us experience it; let us live it distinctively, in truth and in spirit, as a pleasant sacrifice unto the Most High God
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: bible, christian-quotes, true-worshipers

quote: The Bible describes everything, including you!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: behavior, bible, life

quote: the death of a great man demands the birth of a great son
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: death, life, lost, lovers, psyche, replacement

quote: A small temptation can stop a great glory and turn great joy into a great sorrow
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: criticism, guard-your-heart, heart-quotes, heartbreak, joyful-living-quotes, mockery, patience-quotes, scorn, sorrow, temptation

quote: Situation after situation, shape your attitude! Situation after situation change your character!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: character, emotions-and-attitude, grow-up

quote: No matter how strong you are, you don’t just fight any fight at all! When you fight a wrong fight, you die a wrong death!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: When you get to the junction of choices, ponder!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: We fail to open the right doors because we fail to pick the right keys!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: choices, do-the-right-thing, opportunities, regret, right-and-wrong-things, right-keys, right-path

quote: The size of a book never matter as the size of wisdom in the book
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: attitude-quotes, books, buying-a-book, choices, looks, wisdom

quote: True purpose dies when true people who are suppose to keep it alive fail to give it life
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Don’t just think about what you missed! Don’t continue to dwell on your past mistakes. You shall always miss something in life, consciously or unconsciously! You shall never be able to do all things excellently in life though you must try to! The lesson from what you missed and its application for a better tomorrow is what matter! Move your thought! Move your body!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accidents, choices, free-your-mind, haste, impatience, misfortunes, mistakes, moving-on, painful-experience, perfection, perfectionist, regrets, shift-your-thinking, thinking-positive, wrong-choices

quote: Don’t just think about what you missed! Don’t continue to dwell on your past mistakes. You shall also miss something in life, consciously or unconsciously! You shall never be able to do all things excellently in life though you must try to! The lesson from what you missed and its application for a better tomorrow is what matter! Move your thought! Move your body!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: accidents, choices, free-your-mind, haste, impatience, misfortunes, mistakes, moving-on, perfection, perfectionist, regrets, shift-your-thinking, thinking-positive, wrong

quote: Tomorrow is tomorrow and today is today. Tomorrow will come and we shall still say today. Worry not yourself about tomorrow but today! Plan your tomorrow today and tomorrow will never be a regretful yesterday for you. Those who least plan their tomorrow today always meet tomorrow and still live in yesterday.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: choices, choices-and-attitude, choices-and-consequences, life-choices, make-the-very-best-of-your-life, plan-your-life, regrets, stay-focused, today-is-your-day

quote: Aside God, you have just one boss! That is you. You choose to be a good boss or a bad boss with the business of your life! That is you!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: a-profitable-life, choices, life, life-choices

quote: be patient enough to identify the real reasons why you meet people, situations and moments in time or else you would be patient enough to analyze the real reasons why you missed people, situations and moments in time in regret or in wonder
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
